text.ru: Uhm... holy... what... what is...? What... again...

text.en: Ooh... impulse... ...bleh... terrible...! Man, my head is killing me!
text.ru: Ooh... impulse... ...bleh... terrible...! Man, my head is killing me!

text.en: We'll wait for you here. If anything happens, we got your back.
text.ru: We'll wait for you here. If anything happens, we got your back.

text.en: Oh, crap! We've better get out of here, pronto!
text.ru: Oh, crap! We've better get out of here, pronto!

text.en: So you're the hole expert, eh? He-he-he... Don't worry, you can count on the boys to take the muties out, nice and quick.
text.ru: So you're the hole expert, eh? He-he-he... Don't worry, you can count on the boys to take the muties out, nice and quick.

text.en: Hmm... it looks quiet. We can advance.
text.ru: Hmm... it looks quiet. We can advance.

text.en: It's all good. There were a few hamsters in there, but we dealt with them.
text.ru: It's all good. There were a few hamsters in there, but we dealt with them.

text.en: Look like that was the last of them.
text.ru: Look like that was the last of them.

text.en: Hiya, it's Nitro. Swing by for that memory module. It's ready for you.
text.ru: Hiya, it's Nitro. Swing by for that memory module. It's ready for you.

text.en: Ok, it's a deal: we'll go together. Whatever fighters you see, send them my way and I'll make a team out of them. Once everything is ready, give me a shout. We'll pick up Nitro and head for Jupiter.
text.ru: Ok, it's a deal: we'll go together. Whatever fighters you see, send them my way and I'll make a team out of them. Once everything is ready, give me a shout. We'll pick up Nitro and head for Jupiter.

text.en: Looks like a quiet village... unless we disturb the local residents.
text.ru: Looks like a quiet village... unless we disturb the local residents.

text.en: So peaceful, it's like a resort.
text.ru: So peaceful, it's like a resort.

text.en: Get up here, things are about to kick off!
text.ru: Get up here, things are about to kick off!

text.en: Come on, what are you waiting for? You'll miss the best part.
text.ru: Come on, what are you waiting for? You'll miss the best part.

text.en: What are you doing? Hurry up, the fun stuff is about to start.
text.ru: What are you doing? Hurry up, the fun stuff is about to start.

text.en: So, that's that. I can see you're bursting with questions, and I can understand that. Let's have a little talk, shall we?
text.ru: So, that's that. I can see you're bursting with questions, and I can understand that. Let's have a little talk, shall we?

text.en: Looks like I was right after all. Now the zombies are gonna cover us, shoot those bastards down!
text.ru: Looks like I was right after all. Now the zombies are gonna cover us, shoot those bastards down!

text.en: Looks like I was right after all. Shoot those bastards down!
text.ru: Looks like I was right after all. Shoot those bastards down!

text.en: Hello stalker, what do you need?
Let's see if I was right.
text.ru: Let's see if I was right.

text.en: Alright, I have a very simple job for you. I need you to deliver a message to my pal, Ashot. He needs his PDA fixed - tell him to bring it over here.
text.ru: Хорошо, у меня есть очень простая работа. Мне нужно доставить сообщение моему приятелю, Ашоту. Он нуждается в своём отремонтированном КПК - скажи ему, пусть приходит и забирает.

text.en: I'm here to deliver a message
Haha, we were just playing a prank on you, stalker. I can't believe you put up with this shit for so long.
text.ru: Ха-ха, мы просто розыграли малость тебя, сталкер. Я не могу поверить, что ты мирился с этим дерьмом так долго.

text.en: You need to deliver a message. How did you get caught up in the middle of this?
text.ru: Нужно доставить сообщение. И как Вы в это ввязались?

text.en: What did you do that for? He didn't touch you, did he. Damn!
text.ru: What did you do that for? He didn't touch you, did he. Damn!

text.en: Sultan, I've dealt with that loser real good. That will teach him not to mess with us.
text.ru: Sultan, I've dealt with that loser real good. That will teach him not to mess with us.

text.en: Sultan sends his regards. Open wide, punk!
text.ru: Sultan sends his regards. Open wide, punk!

text.en: I got to get away from these assholes, the sooner the better. The loot I've stashed behind the substation should last me a while. It's time to move on. I'm sure they are already looking for me. It's all right tho. We'll see who gets who in the end.
text.ru: I got to get away from these assholes, the sooner the better. The loot I've stashed behind the substation should last me a while. It's time to move on. I'm sure they are already looking for me. It's all right tho. We'll see who gets who in the end.

text.en: Hey! Get out of here! Duty members only.
text.ru: Hey! Get out of here! Duty members only.

text.en: Gavrilenko! I found out about the warehouse. It's Freedom, and there should be lots of them. Bring your whole squad and we'll deal those punks real fast.
text.ru: Gavrilenko! I found out about the warehouse. It's Freedom, and there should be lots of them. Bring your whole squad and we'll deal those punks real fast.

text.en: If this checks out, you'll get access to the warehouse.
text.ru: If this checks out, you'll get access to the warehouse.

text.en: Attention, Freedom! This is Duty territory. Get the hell away from the warehouse!
text.ru: Attention, Freedom! This is Duty territory. Get the hell away from the warehouse!

text.en: Bastards...! Well, they asked for it. Men, commence with the operation!
text.ru: Bastards...! Well, they asked for it. Men, commence with the operation!

text.en: This ain't no public part, boy. You'd best be on your way.
text.ru: This ain't no public part, boy. You'd best be on your way.

text.en: Kremen! Take your men and join Haiduk at the warehouse. Those Duty bastards should come for their stuff any minute now.
text.ru: Kremen! Take your men and join Haiduk at the warehouse. Those Duty bastards should come for their stuff any minute now.

text.en: Great! Now the boys will be able to fight them off. I don't forget favours, so you can use the stash anytime you want. I'll let everyone know.
text.ru: Great! Now the boys will be able to fight them off. I don't forget favours, so you can use the stash anytime you want. I'll let everyone know.

text.en: Sure thing! Just give us a minute to stock up on some ammo.
text.ru: Sure thing! Just give us a minute to stock up on some ammo.

text.en: Hey, it's Trapper. I just had a hunter here who saw a chimera last night. Judging by the description it's the same one we're after. Come, see me if you can. It's important.
text.ru: Hey, it's Trapper. I just had a hunter here who saw a chimera last night. Judging by the description it's the same one we're after. Come, see me if you can. It's important.

text.en: Here we are. Yanov station is a haven of relative safety in the area around Jupiter. This is where we go on our separate ways. But if you need me, look for me by the bar.
text.ru: Here we are. Yanov station is a haven of relative safety in the area around Jupiter. This is where we go on our separate ways. But if you need me, look for me by the bar.

text.en: I need new tools, stalker, something that is hard to come by in the Zone. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
text.ru: Мне нужны новые инструменты. В Зоне их сейчас днем с огнем не сыщешь, а снаряжение чинить чем-то надо. Если интересует, расскажу подробнее.

text.en: I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
text.ru: Принеси мне хотя бы инструменты для грубой работы. В наборе должно быть всё, что мне нужно. Если найдешь, приноси, наградой не обижу.

text.en: Perfect! This is just what I need, stalker. If you need any of your equipment fine-tuned, now I can do it properly.
text.ru: Отлично! То, что мне нужно! Нужно будет улучшить снарягу - заходи, теперь я всё, что угодно сделать могу.

text.en: %s are required by Nitro to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
text.ru: Необходимо принести Азоту %s, чтобы он мог обеспечить более серьёзную модернизацию оружия или бронежилета.

text.en: The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
text.ru: Ты принес мне отличный ремнабор, но в нем оказалось не всё, что мне нужно. Как думаешь, сможешь найти набор получше?

text.en: I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
text.ru: Отлично, принеси мне %s, и я смогу сделать с твоей снарягой очень, очень многое.

text.en: Whoa! You found a nice set of tools for me. Here, I promised you some money in return.
text.ru: Ого! Ты принес отличный набор, дружище. Вот, держи, ты это заслужил.

text.en: %s are required by Nitro to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
text.ru: Необходимо принести Азоту %s, чтобы он мог обеспечить более серьёзную модернизацию оружия или бронежилета.

text.en: The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn't have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
text.ru: Ты принес мне отличный ремнабор, но в нем оказалось не всё, что мне нужно. Как думаешь, сможешь найти инструменты для калибровки?

text.en: I need an %s. I'm not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
text.ru: Отлично, принеси мне %s, и я смогу сделать с твоей снарягой всё, что только пожелаешь.

text.en: Whoa! You found a nice set of tools for me. Here, I promised you some money in return.
text.ru: Ого! Ты принес отличный набор, дружище. Прямо глазам своим не верю. Вот, держи, ты это заслужил.

text.en: %s are required by Nitro to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
text.ru: Необходимо принести Азоту %s, чтобы он мог обеспечить более серьёзную модернизацию оружия или бронежилета.

text.en: First time here? I'm relatively new here myself. The name's Nitro. I work with equipment. I can repair anything you need. But... getting some good tools is a problem around here. If you see anything, bring it straight to me. And if you need any technical help, come see me, and I'll be glad to do what I can for you.
text.ru: First time here? I'm relatively new here myself. The name's Nitro. I work with equipment. I can repair anything you need. But... getting some good tools is a problem around here. If you see anything, bring it straight to me. And if you need any technical help, come see me, and I'll be glad to do what I can for you.

text.en: I have a bad feeling about this.
text.ru: I have a bad feeling about this.

text.en: I'm Trapper... There's no need to introduce yourself.
text.ru: Я - Зверобой. Не представляйся, не надо.

text.en: I've been looking for someone to help keep the area around Yanov a bit safer by depopulating the various mutant lairs found in area. Would you like the job?
text.ru: Хмм... Ты выглядишь довольно опытным. Я ищу опытного охотника, чтобы очистить территорию вокруг Янова от мутантов. Не поможешь?

text.en: Thank you, stalker. The area will be much safer for others because of you. Here is your payment.
text.ru: Спасибо, сталкер. Благодаря тебе здесь теперь будет намного безопаснее. Вот твоя награда:

text.en: Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous for some of the locals. You have been tasked to eliminate the mutant threat within the area. Report back to Trapper after the job is done.
text.ru: Вблизи этого места было замечено скопление мутантов, что создает угрозу местным сталкерам. Зверобой поручил зачистить логово тварей.

text.en: I have a dangerous threat that needs to be eliminated. Not a mutant this time, but a man. He will not be easy to get to but I promise to pay you well. Are you up for the job?
text.ru: Есть опасность, которая должна быть устранена. На этот раз не мутант, хотя неизвестно, кто из них хуже. Нужно устранить опасного сталкера. До него будет не легко добраться, но я обещаю хорошо заплатить. Готов на работу?

text.en: Excellent work stalker. Here is your payment.
Trapper has a high value target that needs to be eliminated.
One of my trappers is in the market for a specific firearm that I don't have available. Would you be able to track one down for me?
text.ru: Значит, такая тут история случилась. Примчался один тип - карманы от денег прямо топырятся! Начал народ себе в компанию нанимать, который не поопытней, а погоношистей, снаряжение пачками скупать... У меня ствол был - чудо, а не пушка! - так я сдуру ему и продал. По деньгам-то не прогадал, врать не буду... Только вся эта компания быстренько накрылась где-то в Зоне. Ну, жалко людей, конечно... Только вот другие теперь будут знать: одним баблом дорогу сквозь Зону не выстелишь. Да, так мне до сих пор ствол тот жалко - такой ствол, и где-то гниёт! Найди такой, а? Хороший гонорар за мной!

text.en: I need a %s. The trapper who wants it goes after dangerous game so he needs it to be in excellent condition. I can pay you well if you find one.
text.ru: Вот, %s - это то, что мне нужно. Для охоты на мутантов нужно только самое лучшее оружие. Я готов хорошо заплатить за него.

text.en: Ah, perfect. This will do nicely. Here is the money I promised you.
text.ru: Безупречно. Красота-то какая. Вот деньги, которые я обещал.

text.en: Trapper is looking for a specific firearm in perfect condition. Return to him if you find one.
text.ru: Зверобой ищет конкретное оружие в отличном состоянии. Вернитесь к нему, если найдёте .

text.en: I have a bounty out on a particular type of mutant. Are you interested?
text.ru: У меня есть заказ на определенного типа трофеи. Интересно?

text.en: Kill this mutant and bring me its %s and I will pay you well, stalker.
text.ru: А заказ, значит, такой: %s . Я заплачу .

text.en: Ah, another threat eliminated and a new decoration for the camp. Well done, stalker.
text.ru: Ага, еще одна угроза устранена и новое украшение для лагеря. Молодец!

text.en: Trapper says he will pay well if I can bring him a %s.
Well, I propose a toast to a brave squad of Duty men, sent to the front lines for some serious green scum ass kicking.
text.ru: Well, I propose a toast to a brave squad of Duty men, sent to the front lines for some serious green scum ass kicking.

text.en: Have I told you the story about Flint? First he set up stalker hunters to get attacked by a chimera, then he left his partner to die in an anomaly and then he joined Freedom. I'd say that's a pretty logical conclusion right there. So, I'd say we drink to the hope that all members of Freedom follow his lead and we'll take care of whoever is left.
text.ru: Have I told you the story about Flint? First he set up stalker hunters to get attacked by a chimera, then he left his partner to die in an anomaly and then he joined Freedom. I'd say that's a pretty logical conclusion right there. So, I'd say we drink to the hope that all members of Freedom follow his lead and we'll take care of whoever is left.

text.en: Let's drink to the fact that even in the center of the Zone there are people who are willing to serve Duty. To our new squad!
text.ru: Let's drink to the fact that even in the center of the Zone there are people who are willing to serve Duty. To our new squad!

text.en: I raise my glass to the fact that this research complex is now fully protected by Duty from mutants, anarchists and other scum.
text.ru: I raise my glass to the fact that this research complex is now fully protected by Duty from mutants, anarchists and other scum.

text.en: Fellows! Let's drink to honour our brave volunteers for taking readings in some of the Zone's most dangerous areas for the good of our scientific progress.
text.ru: Fellows! Let's drink to honour our brave volunteers for taking readings in some of the Zone's most dangerous areas for the good of our scientific progress.

text.en: I propose a toast to Duty fighters who courageously fought off a cowardly attack made by those filthy punks.
text.ru: I propose a toast to Duty fighters who courageously fought off a cowardly attack made by those filthy punks.

text.en: He's dead already. And if it were up to me I'd have all of you follow suit. Teach you to quit exporting the Zone's products outside driven by that same greed.
text.ru: He's dead already. And if it were up to me I'd have all of you follow suit. Teach you to quit exporting the Zone's products outside driven by that same greed.

text.en: Nobody knows what really happened. It's not like you were there to see it.
text.ru: Nobody knows what really happened. It's not like you were there to see it.

text.en: Is that a squad made up of Monolith people? Well, I hope you'll find yourself a bloodsucker squad too, 'cause once you do, the Lieutenant Colonel will definitely add you to the list of dangerous mutants.
text.ru: Is that a squad made up of Monolith people? Well, I hope you'll find yourself a bloodsucker squad too, 'cause once you do, the Lieutenant Colonel will definitely add you to the list of dangerous mutants.

text.en: Ha! Some guard you are. Just last year the Mercenaries had you running around the Dark Valley with your tail between your legs. Or have you forgotten?
text.ru: Ha! Some guard you are. Just last year the Mercenaries had you running around the Dark Valley with your tail between your legs. Or have you forgotten?

text.en: Yes, I can imagine the readings the scientists are getting. Air samples: 100% smoke, water samples: 100% vodka, and idiotic laughter on all sound frequencies.
text.ru: Yes, I can imagine the readings the scientists are getting. Air samples: 100% smoke, water samples: 100% vodka, and idiotic laughter on all sound frequencies.

text.en: That's all right. We'll get our weapons back. You guys have developed a nifty habit of dropping weapons and artefacts whenever you run into our fighters. I don't blame you either. Can't be easy holding at it, what, with your pants shat and all?
text.ru: That's all right. We'll get our weapons back. You guys have developed a nifty habit of dropping weapons and artefacts whenever you run into our fighters. I don't blame you either. Can't be easy holding at it, what, with your pants shat and all?

text.en: Boys! Have you heard how Duty is sticking to its traditions? Take Warrant Officer Morgan, in following the strict need to maintain his faction's reputation he thought it was his "duty" to sell off half his warehouse on the sight.
text.ru: Boys! Have you heard how Duty is sticking to its traditions? Take Warrant Officer Morgan, in following the strict need to maintain his faction's reputation he thought it was his "duty" to sell off half his warehouse on the sight.

text.en: Fall in! Remember? Duty's stalwart traditions were laid down by General Tkachenko himself. He lied to his comrades, misled the HQ and bravely died in a Space Bubble. Here's to all members of Duty following his lead.
text.ru: Fall in! Remember? Duty's stalwart traditions were laid down by General Tkachenko himself. He lied to his comrades, misled the HQ and bravely died in a Space Bubble. Here's to all members of Duty following his lead.

text.en: You know, the first time I saw our new squad I asked them, 'Fellows, would you prefer to join Duty instead? You're free to do as you like, after all.' You know, they said to me, 'No, thank you. With them it's all about the orders. To give, primarily. No wonder their eyes are empty. We've had enough of zombies.'
text.ru: You know, the first time I saw our new squad I asked them, 'Fellows, would you prefer to join Duty instead? You're free to do as you like, after all.' You know, they said to me, 'No, thank you. With them it's all about the orders. To give, primarily. No wonder their eyes are empty. We've had enough of zombies.'

text.en: A member of Duty came up to one of our people, got in the bunker and asked him, 'Professor, could you tell me which artefact is best for fighting boars? Wrenched to protect you from radiation, or Eye to help you with wounds.' Do you know what the answer was? 'Shell is what you need, son. If you see a boar, run back to your base as fast as you can.' Haha!
text.ru: A member of Duty came up to one of our people, got in the bunker and asked him, 'Professor, could you tell me which artefact is best for fighting boars? Wrenched to protect you from radiation, or Eye to help you with wounds.' Do you know what the answer was? 'Shell is what you need, son. If you see a boar, run back to your base as fast as you can.' Haha!

text.en: People, you know how the scientists came to choose our boys to take anomaly measurements? They actually went to see Shulga first and said to him, 'There's a job that needs doing for the benefit of science.' And he said, 'No problem. Who do I have to execute?'
text.ru: People, you know how the scientists came to choose our boys to take anomaly measurements? They actually went to see Shulga first and said to him, 'There's a job that needs doing for the benefit of science.' And he said, 'No problem. Who do I have to execute?'

text.en: With every day that goes by the need for Duty becomes clearer to me. I mean, who else would put together a whole warehouse of weapons and ammo, and then donate it to Freedom? It was really nice of them, wouldn't you say?
text.ru: With every day that goes by the need for Duty becomes clearer to me. I mean, who else would put together a whole warehouse of weapons and ammo, and then donate it to Freedom? It was really nice of them, wouldn't you say?

text.en: Yeah? Well, I seem to remember how your brave squad was on their knees groveling for access to Yanov before an emission.
text.ru: Yeah? Well, I seem to remember how your brave squad was on their knees groveling for access to Yanov before an emission.

text.en: Everyone's got one of those. Duty is a real haven for hypocrites. 'We'll protect the world from the Zone', right after we collect a few artefacts.
text.ru: Everyone's got one of those. Duty is a real haven for hypocrites. 'We'll protect the world from the Zone', right after we collect a few artefacts.

text.en: Good deal. Fanatic should stick with fanatics. You should wear Monolith uniforms too. Lest stalkers might actually confuse you for humans.
text.ru: Good deal. Fanatic should stick with fanatics. You should wear Monolith uniforms too. Lest stalkers might actually confuse you for humans.

text.en: From mutants? You sure you'll have enough space in that bunker when the mutants come out in force? It's not like it's the 100 Rads bar. You can't just hole up there and wait it out.
text.ru: From mutants? You sure you'll have enough space in that bunker when the mutants come out in force? It's not like it's the 100 Rads bar. You can't just hole up there and wait it out.

text.en: If your volunteers drink as much as you do, I can only imagine the readings scientists are getting.
text.ru: If your volunteers drink as much as you do, I can only imagine the readings scientists are getting.

text.en: Yeah, that's right. Bring in as many guards as you can. Now half the Zone knows about your equipment warehouse, so expect visitors.
text.ru: Yeah, that's right. Bring in as many guards as you can. Now half the Zone knows about your equipment warehouse, so expect visitors.

text.en: Hold on...! Find him! Worst is yet... argh...
text.ru: Hold on...! Find him! Worst is yet... argh...

text.en: You should have seen me getting this one artefact the other day. That was something. You know anything about the Quarry? Well. Whatever decent shit there once was is long gone. There's no point looking in anomalies Flint has looked in. Everyone knows that.
text.ru: You should have seen me getting this one artefact the other day. That was something. You know anything about the Quarry? Well. Whatever decent shit there once was is long gone. There's no point looking in anomalies Flint has looked in. Everyone knows that.

text.en: I'll tell you everything there is to say about bloodsuckers. When I was at Zaton, those assholes made life real difficult for just about everyone. Stalkers kept at 'em day and night but it didn't help one bit. Poor bastards. One day I decided to help them out. So I took my shotgun and went straight for the bloodsucker lair. Three days I was partying with those sons of bitches, at times taking on two or even three together. After some quality time with yours truly the bloodsucker problem at Zaton is all but over. The bastards keep their tentacles tucked in at all times.
text.ru: I'll tell you everything there is to say about bloodsuckers. When I was at Zaton, those assholes made life real difficult for just about everyone. Stalkers kept at 'em day and night but it didn't help one bit. Poor bastards. One day I decided to help them out. So I took my shotgun and went straight for the bloodsucker lair. Three days I was partying with those sons of bitches, at times taking on two or even three together. After some quality time with yours truly the bloodsucker problem at Zaton is all but over. The bastards keep their tentacles tucked in at all times.

text.en: Okay, I'll tell you how to kill controllers. The other day I chanced upon a buttload of artefacts and decided to stash them while still en route 'cause my back couldn't hack it any-more. On the way back I got to my stash and there it was, a controller, chilling right on top of it. Now I thought to myself, 'Controller or no controller, I got to get my shit back.' Then I realized that if I shield myself with something its manipulation bullshit won't work on me. So, I picked up a metal grate that I found lying around and started sneaking up on the beast. By the time it woke up to what was going on I pumped off a clip into the cocksucker's head. Just as it started trying to control me I gave it a final bash with my rifle butt and that was that.
text.ru: Okay, I'll tell you how to kill controllers. The other day I chanced upon a buttload of artefacts and decided to stash them while still en route 'cause my back couldn't hack it any-more. On the way back I got to my stash and there it was, a controller, chilling right on top of it. Now I thought to myself, 'Controller or no controller, I got to get my shit back.' Then I realized that if I shield myself with something its manipulation bullshit won't work on me. So, I picked up a metal grate that I found lying around and started sneaking up on the beast. By the time it woke up to what was going on I pumped off a clip into the cocksucker's head. Just as it started trying to control me I gave it a final bash with my rifle butt and that was that.

text.en: Ah! Now that's some story, Flint.
text.ru: Ah! Now that's some story, Flint.

text.en: Flint's a real man, that's for sure.
text.ru: Flint's a real man, that's for sure.

text.en: Well, I'm sure you know about the path from Zaton... No? Well, the guide used to take a massive detour. What I did was create a shortcut by cutting across a straight line, a novel idea. I tried a few places and worked out the way through the anomalies pretty quick. So I sold that info to the guide and now he takes everyone that way.
text.ru: Well, I'm sure you know about the path from Zaton... No? Well, the guide used to take a massive detour. What I did was create a shortcut by cutting across a straight line, a novel idea. I tried a few places and worked out the way through the anomalies pretty quick. So I sold that info to the guide and now he takes everyone that way.

text.en: You heard about the Oasis? Of course you've heard of it. I, on the other hand, have actually been there. I was the first person to work out the way to get there, a pioneer if you will. There ain't no mutants or friggin' anomalies there. It's quiet as a graveyard and full of artefacts. I was there only a few days ago. Sunday, do you know that... Lead you there? Ha! Sorry, but I don't want it getting crowded. Nothing personal.
text.ru: You heard about the Oasis? Of course you've heard of it. I, on the other hand, have actually been there. I was the first person to work out the way to get there, a pioneer if you will. There ain't no mutants or friggin' anomalies there. It's quiet as a graveyard and full of artefacts. I was there only a few days ago. Sunday, do you know that... Lead you there? Ha! Sorry, but I don't want it getting crowded. Nothing personal.

text.en: Well, I've got a lot of stories to tell. Did I tell you about my time working for the scientists? So, one day I go and pop in to their bunker, real curious to see what they're up to in there. At first they're all in shock. But then they go, 'You're exactly what we need right now.' It turns out they wanted to set up their devices under anomalies. Obviously the eggheads didn't feel like doing it themselves, so they promised me cash and other goodies. So I was like, 'Well, that's fine, but the goodies better be worth it!' I had to crawl around that area looking for anomalies but it wasn't half as hard as getting those nerds to fork up their award money.
text.ru: Well, I've got a lot of stories to tell. Did I tell you about my time working for the scientists? So, one day I go and pop in to their bunker, real curious to see what they're up to in there. At first they're all in shock. But then they go, 'You're exactly what we need right now.' It turns out they wanted to set up their devices under anomalies. Obviously the eggheads didn't feel like doing it themselves, so they promised me cash and other goodies. So I was like, 'Well, that's fine, but the goodies better be worth it!' I had to crawl around that area looking for anomalies but it wasn't half as hard as getting those nerds to fork up their award money.

text.en: There might be a few folk who think that Flint is telling lies. Well, they can ask anyone at the base about me. Even the squad of pro hunters, when they spotted me the other day they were all like, 'We need you, Flint. We can't do it without you.' They were hunting a chimera, so I had to show these "pros" how it's done. My ammo is real friggin' simple. I just head straight into the lair. They left one rookie by the entrance to keep an eye out for it. Of course, come morning, as soon as the newbie saw the beast he shat his pants and legged it, so I had to deal with it myself. Successfully, as you can see, he-he-he...
text.ru: There might be a few folk who think that Flint is telling lies. Well, they can ask anyone at the base about me. Even the squad of pro hunters, when they spotted me the other day they were all like, 'We need you, Flint. We can't do it without you.' They were hunting a chimera, so I had to show these "pros" how it's done. My ammo is real friggin' simple. I just head straight into the lair. They left one rookie by the entrance to keep an eye out for it. Of course, come morning, as soon as the newbie saw the beast he shat his pants and legged it, so I had to deal with it myself. Successfully, as you can see, he-he-he...

text.en: Congratulations on joining Duty! Follow me! Left, right, left, right...
text.ru: Congratulations on joining Duty! Follow me! Left, right, left, right...

text.en: See? You can do it when you want to. Time to take the oath.
text.ru: See? You can do it when you want to. Time to take the oath.

text.en: Do you swear to serve Duty with courage and integrity, to protect humanity from the Zone's aggression, and always follow the code?
text.ru: Do you swear to serve Duty with courage and integrity, to protect humanity from the Zone's aggression, and always follow the code?

text.en: Why do you standing around for? Have a seat and let's talk!
text.ru: Why do you standing around for? Have a seat and let's talk!

text.en: We don't have a strict hierarchy. Earn our respect, and you'll get plenty of followers. However, when on a mission we obey the commander's orders without question.
text.ru: We don't have a strict hierarchy. Earn our respect, and you'll get plenty of followers. However, when on a mission we obey the commander's orders without question.

text.en: We respect the freedom of our members and other stalkers, and we believe that the Zone is open to all. Being the greatest gift humanity has ever received, it's an opportunity to take a tremendous leap in our development, and everyone needs to understand that.
text.ru: We respect the freedom of our members and other stalkers, and we believe that the Zone is open to all. Being the greatest gift humanity has ever received, it's an opportunity to take a tremendous leap in our development, and everyone needs to understand that.

text.en: Stalker! Could you come over here?
text.ru: Stalker! Could you come over here?

text.en: You'd be better off speaking to Strider.
text.ru: You'd be better off speaking to Strider.

text.en: Strider is the one you ought to talk to.
text.ru: Strider is the one you ought to talk to.

text.en: We can sit around here all day, but that won't get us anywhere.
text.ru: We can sit around here all day, but that won't get us anywhere.

text.en: There's nothing but mutants around here.
text.ru: There's nothing but mutants around here.

text.en: The first thing we need to do is work out where the hell we are.
text.ru: The first thing we need to do is work out where the hell we are.

text.en: Attention, attention! This is Hermann. The science laboratory is under attack. We won't be allowing stalkers in for a while.
text.ru: Attention, attention! This is Hermann. The science laboratory is under attack. We won't be allowing stalkers in for a while.

text.en: Attention, attention! This is Hermann. Our mobile laboratory is open to stalkers once again.
text.ru: Attention, attention! This is Hermann. Our mobile laboratory is open to stalkers once again.

text.en: Stalker! I must warn you that entering the bunker with a weapon is strictly prohibited.
text.ru: Stalker! I must warn you that entering the bunker with a weapon is strictly prohibited.

text.en: Stalker! You must holster your weapon by the entrance to the research facility.
text.ru: Stalker! You must holster your weapon by the entrance to the research facility.

text.en: You hear me? Holster your weapon!
text.ru: You hear me? Holster your weapon!

text.en: ...whichever way we go, we always end up at the same exact spot. I still can't get used to this fog. It's weird that Chepurnoy disappeared without a trace. Maybe he found a way out. ... Day six. We've ran out of water. The Colonel flipped his lid and shot two people at point blank range, and then himself. Now I'm on my own in this damn anomaly. If I hadn't fixed for our communications with HQ to go down, they could've rescued us. And Duty wouldn't have existed. I wonder how things would've turned out. ... Ah, screw it! That Captain Tkachenko died a long time ago. And this General Tkachenko of Duty will follow him. That's... Justice, I suppose.
text.ru: ...whichever way we go, we always end up at the same exact spot. I still can't get used to this fog. It's weird that Chepurnoy disappeared without a trace. Maybe he found a way out. ... Day six. We've ran out of water. The Colonel flipped his lid and shot two people at point blank range, and then himself. Now I'm on my own in this damn anomaly. If I hadn't fixed for our communications with HQ to go down, they could've rescued us. And Duty wouldn't have existed. I wonder how things would've turned out. ... Ah, screw it! That Captain Tkachenko died a long time ago. And this General Tkachenko of Duty will follow him. That's... Justice, I suppose.

text.en: ...find a way out. Help! We're running low on...
text.ru: ...find a way out. Help! We're running low on...

text.en: ...much longer. We've been without water for two day. Requesting a rescue mission! Hel...
text.ru: ...much longer. We've been without water for two day. Requesting a rescue mission! Hel...

text.en: ...require immediate assistance! We won't hold out for more than three...
text.ru: ...require immediate assistance! We won't hold out for more than three...

text.en: You shouldn't have come here, stalker! Now you'll be wormfood.
text.ru: You shouldn't have come here, stalker! Now you'll be wormfood.

text.en: Hello! It's always nice to see a new face in our bunker.
text.ru: Здравствуйте! Всегда рад видеть нового человека в нашем бункере.

text.en: Is that everything? Good bye then.
text.ru: Мм-м, у вас всё? Тогда будьте здоровы.

text.en: Ehh... very well, come on over. What can I do for you?
Yes, you have my undivided attention.
What would you like to say to me?
We need an experienced stalker to lead a few of our the colleagues out into the field for study. Are you up for the task?
text.ru: Нам нужен опытный сталкер, который согласится провести наших коллег до места исследований и обеспечить их безопасность во время оных. Вы нам не поможете?

text.en: Thank you for your protection, stalker. Please, take this as a token of our gratitude.
text.ru: Спасибо за вашу защиту, сталкер. Пожалуйста, примите это в знак нашей признательности.

text.en: Scientists have hired you to guide them to a specific location for study. Once their research has been successfully conducted, return them safely to camp.
text.ru: Необходимо провести учёных к определенному месту и обеспечить их безопасность, пока те проводят исследования, а затем привести обратно в лабораторию.

text.en: We are looking for certain kinds of artefacts. If you are interested, I will tell you what we need.
text.ru: Учёным нужны некоторые виды артефактов, чтобы провести над ними исследования. Если интересует, расскажу подробнее.

text.en: I need you to bring us back a %s. You ever heard of it? We have something we can give you in return that I think you will find useful.
text.ru: К примеру, %s. Слышал о таком? Если принесешь, получишь вознаграждение.

text.en: Great! You've found exactly what we are looking for. Take this suit, it offers great protection against the Zone and I'm sure you can command a good price for it.
text.ru: Отличный образец, именно то, что нужно. Спасибо, сталкер, вот обещанная награда:

text.en: You have been asked to retrieve the %s artefact. Bring it back to Tukarev if you happen to get your hands on one.
text.ru: Гарин поручил принести артефакт %s , чтобы учёные смогли провести над ним исследования.

text.en: Okay, let's do this fast. The quicker we finish the more chance we have of staying alive.
text.ru: Парни, всё делаем в темпе. Чем раньше закончим, тем целее будем.

text.en: Alpha, beta and gamma radiation readings taken.
text.ru: Уровень альфа, бета и гамма излучения замерен.

text.en: We're getting there. The torsion field scan is almost done.
text.ru: We're getting there. The torsion field scan is almost done.

text.en: We're done here, stalker. Now let's get the hell out of here!
text.ru: We're done here, stalker. Now let's get the hell out of here!

text.en: Hey! Are you covering us, or what?
text.ru: Hey! Are you covering us, or what?

text.en: Stalker! What the hell are you doing?!
text.ru: Stalker! What the hell are you doing?!

text.en: They're attacking us! Stalker, what the...
text.ru: They're attacking us! Stalker, what the...

text.en: Acoustic data acquired for all ranges.
text.ru: Acoustic data acquired for all ranges.

text.en: Acoustic data collected for two ranges so far.
text.ru: Acoustic data collected for two ranges so far.

text.en: Stingray-4, come in! Come in, dammit! Stingray-4, do you read? ... Attention, Stingray group! This is Stingray-1. The emergency evacuation position is B-Two-Eight. I repeat, B-Two-Eight!
text.ru: Stingray-4, come in! Come in, dammit! Stingray-4, do you read? ... Attention, Stingray group! This is Stingray-1. The emergency evacuation position is B-Two-Eight. I repeat, B-Two-Eight!

text.en: Two bodies... Looks like they died in the crash. ... Everything of value has been looted and the on-board computer has been wiped clean. But the black box is still intact. ... Interesting. ... I reckon a decent technician will be able to extract the information on it and then decode it.
text.ru: Two bodies... Looks like they died in the crash. ... Everything of value has been looted and the on-board computer has been wiped clean. But the black box is still intact. ... Interesting. ... I reckon a decent technician will be able to extract the information on it and then decode it.

text.en: Rank has eight different levels starting at 'Rookie' and finishing at 'Legend'. It can be increased through almost any in-game activity, and certain features may require reaching a high rank before they can be used.
text.ru: Ранг имеет восемь различных уровней, начиная с «Новичка» и заканчивая «Легендой». Ранг может быть увеличен за счет почти любой активности в игре, некоторые достижения могут быть получены только при наличии достаточно высокого ранга.

text.en: Truck Cemetery is a large graveyard of irradiated agricultural, civilian and military vehicles. As a great place to hide a stash, an eagle-eyed stalker may find many valuables among the wreckage.
text.ru: Кладбище Техники - большое скопление облучённых сельскохозяйственных, гражданских и военных машин. Отличное место, чтобы скрыть тайник; внимательный сталкер может найти здесь много ценного.

text.en: Artefact types are indicative of the anomalies they are found in. Want one that boosts your burn resistance? Search for a 'Burner' or 'Comet' anomaly and go hunting with your detector.
text.ru: Свойства артефактов зависят от того, в какой аномалии они найдены. Хотите такой, который предохраняет от ожогов? Ищите «жарку» или «комету», только не забудьте взять детектор.

text.en: Completing tasks for factions will increase your goodwill with them. As it increases their traders will gradually offer you greater discounts on their goods and services.
text.ru: Выполнение заданий для группировки улучшит ваши взаимоотношения. Их торговцы будут постепенно предлагать Вам большие скидки на свои товары и услуги.

text.en: As you achieve more in-game your rank will increase, the available ranks are as follows: 'Rookie', 'Trainee', 'Experienced', 'Professional', 'Veteran', 'Expert', 'Master' and 'Legend'.
text.ru: Ваш ранг в игре будет тем выше, чем большего вы добьётесь. Доступные ранги: «Новичок», «Стажёр», «Опытный», «Профессионал», «Ветеран», «Эксперт», «Мастер» и «Легенда».

text.en: Most tasks can be cancelled after you agree to complete them. You can do this by speaking with the stalker who gave you the task. Just remember that cancelling a task will decrease your reputation and goodwill.
text.ru: Большинство заданий может быть отменено после того, как вы согласились взять их. Это можно сделать поговорив со сталкером, который дал вам задание. Просто помните, что отмена задания ухудшит вашу репутацию.

text.en: Reputation is a representation of how a stalker is viewed by their faction. It is gained and lost by helping or harming non-hostile stalkers respectively.
text.ru: Репутация даёт представление о том, как к сталкеру относится своя группировка. Она улучшается или ухудшается в зависимости от того, помогал он или вредил дружественным сталкерам.

text.en: Reputation is dynamic and can frequently change, the available reputations are as follows: 'Terrible', 'Dreary', 'Awful', 'Bad', 'Neutral', 'Good', 'Great', 'Brilliant' and 'Excellent'.
text.ru: Репутация может часто меняться. Доступные категории репутации: «Хуже всех», «Ужасно», «Оч. плохо», «Плохо», «Безразлично», «Хорошо», «Оч. хорошо», «Отлично» и «Великолепно».

text.en: Darkscape is a large forest between Cordon and Dark Valley. While there are few reasons to visit, it is frequently used as a hideout by loners and bandits with a bounty placed on their heads.
text.ru: Тёмная Лощина - большой лес между Кордоном и Темной Долиной. Есть много причин для её посещения; она часто используется в качестве укрытия одиночками и бандитами.

text.en: Remember to ask regular stalkers if they have any jobs available. Just because they aren't anybody important doesn't mean they won't be willing to pay you to do their dirty work.
text.ru: Не забывайте спрашивать простых сталкеров, есть ли у них какие-либо задания. Тот факт, что они не какие-то важные персонажи, не значит, что они не готовы заплатить за работу.

text.en: Rostok's arena hosts two types of competitions: the traditional fights where stalkers battle each other for cash rewards, or challenges where they attempt to kill increasingly harder mutants.
text.ru: Арена на Ростке проводит два вида соревнований: традиционные поединки, где сталкеры сражаются друг с другом за денежное вознаграждение, или бои, где они пытаются убить всё более сильных мутантов.

text.en: Achievements can be unlocked through certain in-game accomplishments or by reaching statistical milestones. Every achievement is unlocked with an appropriate reward which can be viewed in the PDA.
text.ru: Достижения могут быть разблокированы через определённые действия в игре или при достижении определённых статистических этапов. За каждое достижение даётся соответствующая награда, которую можно посмотреть в КПК.

text.en: Online exclusion radius can be set via the game options and defaults to 25m. It creates a no-spawn area around the player preventing mutants and other stalkers spawning unfairly and dangerously close.
text.ru: Радиус запрета спавна может быть установлен через опции игры и по умолчанию равен 25м. Это создаёт область вокруг главного героя, предотвращающую спавн мутантов и других сталкеров в опасной близости к игроку.

text.en: Cold, Spore and the rest of Clear Sky's major characters can be asked about their story. This will help you piece together how the faction survived after the events of S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky.
text.ru: Часть главных персонажей «Чистого Неба» может рассказать интересные истории о себе. Это поможет вам собрать воедино сведения о том, как группировка выжила после событий S.T.A.L.K.E.R.«Чистое Небо».

text.en: Freedom completely occupies Yanov Station in Jupiter after a mysterious stalker assisted them several years ago. Some of their well-known members have since relocated to their new northern base.
text.ru: «Свобода» полностью заняла станцию Янов в окрестностях завода «Юпитер» после того, как в недалёком прошлом им сильно помог таинственный сталкер. Некоторые из хорошо известных членов группировки с тех пор перешли на эту новую северную базу.

text.en: The 'Completionist' achievement is received for unlocking all other available achievements. How many achievements are available to you depends on your faction and whether or not story mode is enabled.
text.ru: Достижение «Опытный сталкер» можно получить разблокировав все другие имеющиеся достижения. Сколько достижений доступны для вас, зависит от вашей группировки и активирована ли сюжетная линия «Тайна Зоны».

text.en: It is much easier to avoid detection when travelling during the night or through heavy rain. However, you risk encountering fierce nocturnal mutants.
text.ru: Передвигаясь в ночное время или в сильный дождь, легче избежать обнаружения врагами, но выше риск встретить ожесточённых ночных мутантов.

text.en: You won't be able to issue orders to companions if you leave them behind. Companions in Wait or Patrol modes will not travel with you to new map locations.
text.ru: Вы не сможете отдавать приказы напарникам, если бросите их и оставите позади. Спутники, находящиеся в засаде или патруле не смогут путешествовать вместе с вами.

text.en: Basic, advanced and expert tools are required by most mechanics in order to perform certain upgrades on weapons and outfits. Such items can often be found in stashes received as rewards for completing tasks.
text.ru: Инструменты требуются большинству механиков для выполнения ремонта и усовершенствования оружия и брони. Такие инструменты часто можно найти в тайниках, полученных в качестве вознаграждения за выполнение заданий.

text.en: Sleep deprivation is an optional feature where the passage of time and using consumables will gradually drain the player - eventually requiring them to rest when prompted. Failing to do so may have dire consequences.
text.ru: «Недосыпание» - необходимость сна - является опциональной функцией, с течением времени главный герой должен будет обязательно отдохнуть. Несоблюдение этого правила может иметь пагубные последствия.

text.en: Helicopter gunships can be seen patrolling many of the Zone's locations. When engaged in combat members of the helicopter's faction may often call on it for air support to help destroy attacking or defending forces.
text.ru: Боевые вертолеты могут патрулировать многие места Зоны. Когда военные участвуют в боевых действиях, они могут запросить поддержку с воздуха, чтобы уничтожить атакующих или обороняющихся противников.

text.en: Ironman mode gives a true sense of mortality. When the player is killed all saves for that specific character are deleted and can never be restored. Pick your faction and starting location wisely.
text.ru: Режим «Одна жизнь» дарит по-настоящему острые ощущения. Если игрок будет убит, все сохранения для этого конкретного героя будут удалены и никогда не смогут быть восстановлены. Выбирайте свою группировку и начальное местоположение с умом.

text.en: Gunsmith and sewing kits are used to repair your weapons and outfits respectively when out in the field. Each allows up to three uses and are best used to repair items of greater value than the kits themselves.
text.ru: Ремонтные и швейные наборы используются в полевых условиях для ремонта вашего оружия и обмундирования соответственно. Каждый может быть использован до трех раз и лучше всего использовать их для ремонта товара большей стоимости, чем сами наборы.

text.en: Backpacks can be bought or found and then used to create a custom stash. Stashes created by the player are never de-spawned nor are they ever looted by other stalkers. They are permanent until all items are removed.
text.ru: Рюкзаки могут быть куплены или найдены, а затем использованы для создания персональных тайников. Тайники, созданные игроком, никогда не будут разграблены другими сталкерами. Они являются постоянными, пока из них не будут удалены все предметы.

text.en: Sleeping bags are a great way to rest in the Zone if you are unable to find a decent bed to sleep in. They can be purchased from most major traders or potentially found in another stalker's stash.
text.ru: Если вы не в состоянии найти приличную кровать для сна, чтобы отдохнуть в Зоне, то спальные мешки будут отличной альтернативой. Они могут быть приобретены у большинства крупных торговцев или найдены в тайниках других сталкеров.

text.en: Rainbow aggression suppressor\nmodel of external emissions complex\nscale 1:20
Need supplies or equipment? Information?... Or maybe you want to sell information?
text.ru: Нужна снаряга? Информация?.. Или, может быть, ты хочешь продать информацию?

text.en: Okay, hotshot. Need a job? This PDA needs delivered to a dude who hangs out at the rookie camp in Cordon; his name is Nimble. He will compensate you on delivery. Don't drop it in a puddle or some dumb shit like that... Or I'll have your ass. While you are there check out what he has to offer, he can get his hands on some nice equipment... For a price.
text.ru: Ладно, говоришь работа нужна? Смотри, ты должен доставить этот КПК чуваку, ошивающемуся у лагеря новичков на Кордоне. Его зовут Шустрый. Он тебе за это и заплатит. Только постарайся не уронить компьютер в лужу по пути, или еще чего подобного сотворить, ладно?

text.en: Spore needs you to deliver an encrypted PDA to Nimble in Cordon.
text.ru: Дрозд попросил отнести зашифрованный КПК Шустрому на Кордон.

text.en: That damn chopper is driving me nuts. I have bad tinnitus and every time that fucking thing is patrolling the southern border it makes my ears scream! Makes me want to bludgeon a baby flesh! Down the fucking thing and I'll give you a discount, please, before I kill somebody.
text.ru: Слушай, одна наша разведгруппа была тайно отправлена обследовать гм... некий объект. Операция шла удачно, но сейчас она на грани срыва. Видимо, военные что-то пронюхали и теперь их вертолет регулярно патрулирует территорию. Нужно уничтожить вертолет и освободить путь. Да и трещит эта грёбаная вертушка так, что уже в ушах шумит, хоть в омут лезь! Так что польза от этого всем будет, в том числе и тебе. Справишься - считай, что скидка тебе обеспечена. Ну как, по рукам?

text.en: Spore is fed up and wants you to destroy the helicopter. He will offer you a discount if you follow through.
text.ru: Дрозд поручил уничтожить военный вертолет. За выполнение задачи он обещал неплохую скидку.

text.en: Scientists here in camp need an experienced stalker to lead them out into the field for study. Are you up for it? Your job is to keep them alive and guide them to their destination. Failure will give you a bad reputation around here.
text.ru: Группе наших учёных нужен опытный проводник. Необходимо провести их до места назначения и обратно целыми и невредимыми. Эти учёные - одни из наших лучших специалистов, поэтому если с ними что-то случится, кхм... тебя здесь невзлюбят, мягко говоря.

text.en: Thank you stalker. You may have this as payment for your services.
Clear Sky scientists have hired you to guide them to a specific location for study. Once their research has been successfully conducted, return them safely to camp; where you will be compensated.
text.ru: Необходимо провести учёных "Чистого Неба" к определенному месту и обеспечить их безопасность, пока те проводят исследования, и затем привести их обратно в лагерь.

text.en: Are you an avid hunter? We've been looking for someone to keep the marshes a bit safer by clearing out mutants in areas that our faction frequents. Would you like the job?
text.ru: Ты охотой не увлекаешься? Тут на днях, около одной важной для нас точки, мутанты устроили логово, и было бы неплохо, если бы кто-то их пострелял. Возьмешься?

text.en: Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's safe there once again. Thank you, stalker.
text.ru: Великолепно! Держи деньги. Теперь на Болотах станет немного спокойнее, спасибо, сталкер.

text.en: Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous for some of the locals. You have been tasked to eliminate the mutant threat within the area. Report back to Librarian after the job is done.
text.ru: В этом месте было обнаружено скопление мутантов, представляющих опасность для местных сталкеров. Необходимо зачистить местность и вернуться к Наливайко за наградой.

text.en: We have a big problem with bandits in the area. Those murderous thugs have been ambushing our camps outside the main base trying to take the territory over. It will deny us passage through many safe routes through the marshes; as long as they are in the area. We need an experienced stalker who is not afraid to get his hands dirty. Will you help us out?
text.ru: У нас большие проблемы с бандитами в этом районе. Эти сволочи житья нам не дают: грабят, шантажируют, захватывают наши лагеря. Они перекрыли большинство безопасных маршрутов через Болота, от них просто необходимо избавиться! Поможешь?

text.en: Fantastic! Here is your payment. I'll make sure to pass the word around that it's safe there once again. Thank you, stalker.
text.ru: Чёрт возьми, спасибо! Уж теперь-то они к нам долго не сунутся! Держи свою награду.

text.en: You have been tasked to eliminate the bandit threat within the area. Report back to Librarian after the job is done.
text.ru: Необходимо зачистить данную местность от бандитов.

text.en: If you are good with a rifle and not afraid of a few mutants, then I have a job for you. Are you interested?
text.ru: Если ты неплохо стреляешь и не боишься мутантов, у меня есть для тебя работа. Интересует?

text.en: Rations are running low and I need to keep everyone in camp's bellies full. Some of the guys bring me back a kill or two every now and again. But it's been slow lately - So if you aren't too busy and you are out and about, I need %s. I kill and process the meat, right here in my kitchen. Keep in mind that getting the mutants all riled up makes the meat tough because of the adrenaline. Also, the lesser the bleeding, the better the meat tastes. So, just be careful with your shots, okay?
text.ru: Запасы еды на исходе, а мне же нужно чем-то ребят кормить. Кто-то время от времени приносит мне одну-две туши мутантов, но в последнее время что-то никто не хочет охотиться. Так что, если ты не занят, и тебя интересует эта работа, будь добр, принеси мне %s. Главное запомни: адреналин, выделяющийся из-за чрезмерного волнения животного делает мясо жестким. Да и чем меньше крови во время убийства, тем вкуснее мясо. Так что, стреляй осторожнее, ладно?

text.en: Great, you are a good hunter after all! I have payment for you.
text.ru: Отлично, а ты таки неплохой охотник! Вот твое вознаграждение:

text.en: Field dress freshly dead mutants to collect game meat. Then deliver %s to Librarian in the Clear Sky base camp.
text.ru: Наливайко попросил принести ему %s, чтобы ему было чем кормить бойцов.

text.en: It's really hard to come by tools here in the Zone. I would be able to perform upgrades on a greater variety of equipment if I can just get my hands on some new tools. If you are interested, I will tell you what I need.
text.ru: В Зоне довольно трудно найти нормальные инструменты, а уж в такой глуши и подавно. Я бы мог чинить и даже улучшать больше снаряжения, будь у меня нормальный набор. Если согласен помочь, скажу что именно мне нужно.

text.en: I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
text.ru: Мне нужен хотя бы набор инструментов для грубой работы. В нем должны быть инструменты и масла, необходимые для работы с оружием. Если сможешь принести их мне, я в долгу не останусь.

text.en: Awesome, man! Here, let me throw some money at you.
text.ru: Отлично! Спасибо, тебе, мужик. Вот твоя награда:

text.en: %s are required by Novikov to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
text.ru: Необходимо принести Новикову %s, чтобы он мог обеспечить более серьёзную модернизацию оружия или бронежилета.

text.en: I could really use more tools. You brought me some good shit last time but I need a higher quality set. If you are interested, I will tell you what I need.
text.ru: Я бы мог делать больше апгрейдов, если бы у меня было достаточно инструментов. Нет, ты принес мне хороший набор, но в нем нет инструментов, необходимых для более глобальных улучшений, мне нужен более полный набор. Поможешь мне еще раз? Деньгами не обижу.

text.en: I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
text.ru: Мне нужен набор инструментов для тонкой работы. В нем должны быть все инструменты, что мне понадобятся.

text.en: Awesome, man! You came through for me once again! Here, let me throw some money at you.
text.ru: Ого, ну спасибо! Ну теперь-то я смогу сделать всё, что угодно! Держи, вот твоя награда:

text.en: %s are required by Novikov to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
text.ru: Необходимо принести Новикову %s, чтобы он мог обеспечить более серьёзную модернизацию оружия или бронежилета.

text.en: I could really use more tools. You brought me some good shit last time but I need a higher quality set. If you are interested, I will tell you what I need.
text.ru: Я бы мог делать больше апгрейдов, если бы у меня было достаточно инструментов. Нет, ты принес мне хороший набор, но в нем нет инструментов, необходимых для более глобальных улучшений, мне нужен более полный набор. Поможешь мне еще раз? Деньгами не обижу.

text.en: I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
text.ru: Мне нужен набор инструментов для калибровки. В нем должны быть все инструменты, что мне понадобятся.

text.en: Awesome, man! You came through for me once again! Here, let me throw some money at you.
text.ru: Ого, ну спасибо! Ну теперь-то я смогу сделать всё, что угодно! Держи, вот твоя награда:

text.en: %s are required by Novikov to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
text.ru: Необходимо принести Новикову %s, чтобы он мог обеспечить более серьёзную модернизацию оружия или бронежилета.

text.en: You came to the Zone seeking to unravel its many mysteries, a familiar face may hold the answers that you seek.
text.ru: Вы стремитесь разгадать многие тайны Зоны. Кое-кто может знать ответы на вопросы, решения которых вы ищете.

text.en: Alright, I'll see what I can do.
text.ru: Ладно, я посмотрю что можно сделать..

text.en: That wasn't so bad, eh? You can go.
text.ru: Не так уж и больно, правда? Можешь идти.

text.en: Alright, I'll take a look... No wounds? You show no signs of radiation sickness. I think everything is in order; You are good to go.
text.ru: Так, давай глянем... Ранений нет... Никаких признаков радиационного облучения. Думаю, всё в порядке, можешь идти.

text.en: What is it you want to know?

A fresh face! People around here call me Librarian. I'm the local bartender. I'll be glad to answer any questions you have. Sometimes I post job offerings or hear some interesting rumours, so check back often.
text.ru: О, новые лица! Меня здесь Наливайко кличут, я местный бармен - кто же ещё? С удовольствием отвечу на все твои вопросы. Нужна будет работенка, или новости последние услышать захочешь - подходи, поговорим.

text.en: Hey, stalker. What do you need?
Greetings, stalker. Can I be of assistance? Good tools are hard to come by in the Zone, but I can still repair your kit and do minor upgrades.
text.ru: Приветствую, сталкер. Могу чем-то помочь? С хорошими инструментами в Зоне напряг, но я пока могу починить твою снарягу, или сделать простенькие апгрейды.

text.en: An experimental sample of a military exoskeleton. Painted in mercenary colours, their demand is high between veteran mercs. Comes with a built-in artefact containers.
text.ru: Экспериментальный образец военного экзоскелета западного производства, раскрашенный в цвета группировки. Пользуется популярностью среди наёмников-ветеранов. Оснащен двумя контейнерами для артефактов.

text.en: Outfit of choice for the Mercenary faction. It's design is based on the suit used by the special forces of the Western armies. Due to a special treatment of the fabric, the armour has a strengthened stability during the physical movement of its plates. Comes with built-in artefact containers.
text.ru: Комбинезон сталкера из группировки «Наёмники». За основу взяты образцы экипировки спецназа западных армий. За счёт специальной обработки ткани усилена устойчивость брони при физическом смещении пластин. Два встроенных контейнера для артефактов.

text.en: An insignia torn from the uniform of a mercenary.

Suit for mercenaries who foraged in the anomalous zones. Protection systems with a closed cycle, built-in suppression action anomalous fields. It provides good protection from bullet and shrapnel hit, but not enough for large-scale hostilities. Fully upgradeable and boasting two built-in artefact containers.
text.ru: Костюм для отрядов наемников, разработанный специально для выполнения заданий в зонах с сильной аномальной активностью. Система с замкнутым циклом регенерации воздуха и встроенную систему подавления действий аномальных полей. Обеспечивает хорошую защиту от пулевых и осколочных ранений, но для крупномасштабных военных действий не подходит. Может похвастаться двумя встроенными контейнерами для артефактов.

text.en: I have just the job for you, man, if you are not afraid of a few mutants. Are you interested?
text.ru: Да, чувак, есть для тебя одно дельце. Времена нынче голодные, сам понимаешь. Нормальной еды не найдешь, а бойцов-то кормить чем-то надо. Бывает, конечно, иногда чуваки приносят пару-тройку плотей или кабанов, но в последнее время что-то всё меньше желающих за мясом ходить. Подсоби, а? Пока мы совсем тут с голоду не померли.

text.en: Some of the guys bring me back a kill or two every now and again. But it's been slow lately - So if you aren't too busy and you are out and about, I need %s. Our cook kills and processes the meat, right here in the kitchen.
text.ru: Спасибо, мэн. Принеси %s, а Повар наш уж что-нибудь из него сообразит.

text.en: Great, you are a good hunter! I have payment for you.
text.ru: Спасибо, чувак, ну выручил! Вот, держи, чем богат.

text.en: Field dress freshly dead mutants to collect game meat. Then deliver %s to Skinflint in the Military Warehouse base camp.
text.ru: Необходимо доставить Скряге %s, чтобы «Свободе» было чем кормить бойцов.

text.en: Forces hostile to Freedom are moving in on one of our camps. I need someone capable to repel the incursion. Are you the man for the job?
text.ru: Мне тут шепнули, что на лагерь наш атака готовится. Надо бы пришить супостатов до того, как они на нас нападут, сделаешь?

text.en: Intercept the assault squad closing in on a Freedom camp. Report back to Lukash once you have cleared the area.
text.ru: Необходимо уничтожить отряд противника в указанной точке и доложить о выполнении.

text.en: I have an important mission if you are willing. Duty has taken over one of our camps and I need an infiltrator to reclaim it.
text.ru: Есть одна миссия. «Должники», чтоб им пусто было, всё не унимаются: патрули наши обстреливают, на блокпосты нападают. Вот на днях лагерь наш захапали. Некрасиво это, понимаешь? Надо бы проучить этих засранцев, пока они в открытую на нас не поперли.

text.en: You have been tasked to defend a faction territory. Report back to Lukash after the job is done.
text.ru: Необходимо отвоевать территорию группировки и доложить о выполнении.

text.en: I have a very dangerous mission. I've asked for volunteers but so far no one has stepped forward. Monolith forces keep breaking through our blockade. I want to take the fight to them for once. I need someone to enter their territory and take out a certain member of their faction to send them a message. What do you think? Are you the biggest daredevil in this camp?
text.ru: Есть одна работа... Опасная, да. Наших сколько не проси – ни в какую не соглашаются, может хоть ты откликнешься. «Монолит» раз за разом продолжает прорываться за наш Барьер, мы уже едва сдерживаем эти бесконечные толпы фанатиков, прущие напролом. Но у меня есть идея, как прекратить эти прорывы хотя бы на время. Нужен кто-то, кто сможет пробраться на их территорию и убрать определенного члена группировки, чтобы слегка поубавить им боевой дух. Что думаешь? Остались еще в Зоне храбрецы?

text.en: Ah, you survived! Man, you've got a set on you. Great job.
text.ru: Отлично! Вот - то, что я обещал:

text.en: Lukash has tasked you with finding and eliminating a member of Monolith.
text.ru: Лукаш дал задание найти и устранить цель.

text.en: There is a certain individual who has been very loud in his opposition to Freedom and needs to be quieted. Are you any good at shutting people up?
text.ru: Один сталкер, бывший свободовец, который знал много информации о важных объектах в Припяти, недавно переметнулся на сторону «Долга». Нужно убить его, пока он не наболтал лишнего.

text.en: Great! You do us proud. Here is what I promised:
text.ru: Хорошо! Ты помог нам. Вот - то, что я обещал:

text.en: Lukash has tasked you with finding and eliminating a target.
text.ru: Лукаш просил найти и устранить предателя.

text.en: With Duty to the south of us and Monolith to the north, we are cut off. Our weaponry is wearing out and we need replacements. Have you ever done any gun running?
text.ru: «Долг» к югу от нас, с севера пути перекрывает «Монолит». Мы буквально отрезаны от наших поставщиков, оружие изнашивается, а нам нужно где-то брать новое. Поможешь с этим?

text.en: We could really use a new %s. If you can find us one in great condition I would be willing to pay a good price for it.
text.ru: Вот, %s - это то, что нужно. Если ты сможешь найти его в отличном состоянии, я заплачу хорошую цену.

text.en: Well done. This will go a long way in helping us defend the Zone. Here is the payment I promised.
text.ru: Спасибо за ствол. Вот платеж, как я и обещал.

text.en: Lukash has asked you to find a specific firearm in mint condition. Return to him when you find what he is looking for.
text.ru: Лукаш попросил найти %s в безупречном состоянии. Возвратитесь к нему, когда найдёте.

text.en: Yo, man. Are you interested in doing a job for me? I need specific tools to operate on weapons.
text.ru: О, тебе работа нужна? Принеси мне кое-какие инструменты, а я тебя отблагодарю как положено. Сделаешь?

text.en: Good, I need a %s. I will pay you if you can bring a set back to me.
text.ru: Хорошо, мне нужны %s. Я даже денег тебе отвалю, если достать сможешь.

text.en: Thanks, man! I knew there was a reason I asked you. You look like a man who can get shit done.
text.ru: Спасибо, мэн! Я знал, что ты справишься! Сразу видно - надёжный человек.

text.en: %s are required by Screw to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
text.ru: Нужно принести Шурупу %s, чтобы он мог обеспечить более серьёзную модернизацию оружия или бронежилета.

text.en: Haha, I hate to ask. But I could really use more tools. You brought me what I have asked last time but I need a higher quality set. Can you help out again?
text.ru: Да, работа найдется. Я не очень-то люблю что-то выпрашивать, но мне бы нужны еще инструменты. Не, чувак, ты не подумай, тот набор, что ты притащил просто отпадный, но в нем есть не всё, что мне нужно. Сможешь достать набор получше?

text.en: I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
text.ru: Я знал, что ты не откажешь! Мне нужен набор для тонкой работы. С ним-то я смогу сделать если не всё, то многое. Загляни как найдешь.

text.en: You keep this shit up, everyone around here is going to love you. Thanks, man.
text.ru: Офигенно, чувак! Теперь все здесь будут знать: на тебя таки можно положиться! Спасибо, мэн.

text.en: %s are required by Screw to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
text.ru: Нужно принести Шурупу %s, чтобы он мог обеспечить более серьёзную модернизацию оружия или бронежилета.

text.en: Haha, I hate to ask. But I could really use more tools. You brought me what I have asked last time but I need a higher quality set. Can you help out again?
text.ru: Хех, я не очень-то люблю что-то выпрашивать, но мне бы не помешали еще инструменты. Не, чувак, ты не подумай, ты притащил просто отпадный набор, но в нем есть не всё, что мне нужно. Сможешь достать набор получше?

text.en: I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
text.ru: Я знал, что ты не откажешь! Мне нужен набор для калибровки. С ним-то я смогу сделать всё, что угодно. Загляни как найдешь.

text.en: You keep this shit up, everyone around here is going to love you. Thanks, man.
%s are required by Screw to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
text.ru: Нужно принести Шурупу %s, чтобы он мог обеспечить более серьёзную модернизацию оружия или бронежилета.

text.en: The Military members decided using heavier materials to improve bullet resistance over others, this version of the exoskeleton though heavy makes one feel like a tank. The only downfall is the weak anomaly protection provided with the armour is very lacking and even the most basic of anomalies can take down this tank. Does not come with an artefact container.
text.ru: Превращает своего владельца в настоящий ходячий танк. Использованы керамические бронепанели 4 класса защиты, поясные крепления в боковой части имеют защитные экраны, обеспечивающие защиту боков, что повлекло за собой значительное увеличение веса. Стандартно комплектуется противогазом S10. Оснащен устройством для питья, позволяющем пить воду бойцу, находящемуся долгое время в зараженной окружающей среде. Единственные недостатки - очень слабая защита от аномалий и нет контейнера для артефактов.

text.en: This modern military armoured suit is designed for assault operations in anomalous areas. Comprises a PSZ-12p heavy military armoured suit, built-in compensation suit, and an anomalous protection bodysuit. The armour provides excellent protection against bullet and fragmentation damage, without greatly reducing the wearer's mobility. Does not come with an artefact container.
text.ru: Современный армейский бронекостюм для проведения штурмовых операций в зонах аномальной активности. Бронезащитные элементы изготавливаются из баллистической ткани, для которой в качестве основы используется высокопрочное волокно "Армос" с масловодоотталкивающей обработкой. Компоненты: тяжёлый бронежилет серии ПСЗ-12п, комбинезон аномальной защиты и компенсационный костюм. Предоставляет великолепную защиту от пуль и осколков и при этом удобен, почти не ограничивает подвижность носителя. Не оснащается контейнерами для артефактов.

text.en: An armour made by either Monolithians or an unknown manufacturer. It includes a flak vest of unknown origin and also features unique modifications creating a slight resistance to radiation. System has been upgraded to match the military exoskeleton bodysuit. The suit has two artefact containers.
text.ru: Технология и место производства неизвестны. Ориентирован на активные боевые действия. Включает в себя бронежилет неизвестного происхождения и уникальную защиту от радиации. Оснащён двумя контейнерами для артефактов.

text.en: An armour made by either Monolithians or an unknown manufacturer. It includes a flak vest of unknown origin and also features unique modifications creating a slight resistance to radiation. The suit has two artefact containers.
text.ru: Комбинезон сталкера группировки «Монолит». Производитель неизвестен. По структуре напоминает широко распространённые среди нейтральных сталкеров комбинезоны, в которых бронежилет соединяется с костюмом противорадиационной защиты. Неплохо защищает от слабого стрелкового оружия и аномальной активности. Оснащен двумя контейнерами для артефактов.

text.en: An insignia torn from a uniform of the Monolith faction.

An armour made by either Monolithians or an unknown manufacturer. It includes a flak vest of unknown origin and also features unique modifications creating a slight resistance to radiation. The anomaly protection system has been upgraded to match the SEVA bodysuit. The suit has two artefact containers.
text.ru: Комбинезон сталкера группировки «Монолит». Производитель неизвестен. Имеет противоосколочный бронежилет неизвестного происхождения, а также уникальные модификации, уменьшающие воздействие радиации. Оснащен тремя контейнерами для артефактов.

text.en: This exoskeleton provides outstanding protection against bullet and fragmentation damage at the cost of mobility. Vulnerable to armour-piercing rounds.
text.ru: This exoskeleton provides outstanding protection against bullet and fragmentation damage at the cost of mobility. Vulnerable to armour-piercing rounds.

text.en: A military armoured suit made for assault operations. Provides outstanding protection against full metal jacket rounds and fragmentation damage without reducing the wearer's mobility. Vulnerable to armour-piercing rounds.
text.ru: A military armoured suit made for assault operations. Provides outstanding protection against full metal jacket rounds and fragmentation damage without reducing the wearer's mobility. Vulnerable to armour-piercing rounds.

text.en: This bodysuit, intended for conducting research in the Zone, combines a closed-cycle respiratory module and an external isolation coating, resulting in excellent protection from anomalies. Due to poor protection from physical impact, the suit is not a good defence against bullet and fragmentation damage. Comes with a built-in artefact transportation container.
text.ru: This bodysuit, intended for conducting research in the Zone, combines a closed-cycle respiratory module and an external isolation coating, resulting in excellent protection from anomalies. Due to poor protection from physical impact, the suit is not a good defense against bullet and fragmentation damage. Comes with a built-in artefact transportation container.

text.en: Much tougher to chew than their non-radioactive counterpart outside the Zone. Mutated boar chops will fetch a low but reasonable price.
text.ru: Ответ Зоны свиным отбивным с Большой Земли. Жуётся гораздо сложнее, нежели мясо их нормальных сородичей.

text.en: Boar hoofs are often worn by some stalkers around their necks as a good luck charm. Whilst others believe they have more 'exotic' uses when ground into a fine powder.
text.ru: Некоторые сталкеры вешают копыта кабанов себе на шею как талисман. Кое-кто также находит им более экзотическое применение, перетирая их в порошок.

text.en: The hands of a burer are directly linked to their psychic abilities, able to move objects, shield themselves and cause shock-waves from a distance. Naturally they are of particular interest to the Ecologists, and are very valuable.
text.ru: Руки бюреров определенно связаны с их способностями двигать объекты, создавать защитные поля и атаковать противников ментальными волнами. Представляют большую ценность для учёных.

text.en: Cats in the Zone are believe to have evolved from local population of wild Lynx. Theirs tails are carried by stalkers as a symbol of awareness, giving them at least some value unlike those of their canine counterparts.
text.ru: Считается, что кошки в Зоне произошли от диких рысей. Сталкеры носят их хвосты на поясе в качестве трофеев, что даёт им хоть какую-то пользу, в отличие от собачьих.

text.en: Whilst able to tear through several sheets of Kevlar without struggle, they are often worn down through such extreme use, and much like their teeth, are shed and replaced frequently making them an inexpensive commodity.
text.ru: Несмотря на то, что коготь этого существа может без труда разрезать несколько листов кевлара, они часто изнашиваются из-за экстремальных условий применения, и, так же как и ее зубы, попросту отпадают, заменяясь новыми, что делает их не очень дорогим товаром.

text.en: A tooth extracted from the mouth of a chimera. Unusually, the chimera sheds and replaces is teeth throughout the entirety of its lifetime, meaning most that are found usually broken or worn, and not very valuable.
text.ru: Зуб из пасти химеры. Как известно, химеры меняют зубы на протяжении всей своей жизни, из-за чего их часто находят сломанными или изношенными и не особо ценят.

text.en: A heavy slab of meat harvested from a chimera. Not many get the chance to feast upon such a horrifying beast, so naturally the meat is found sold at high prices.
text.ru: Массивный кусок мяса химеры. Немногие могут позволить себе таким попировать, поэтому и цена ему дана немалая.

text.en: The brains of controllers are highly developed, able to take over the minds of other beings. For this very reason they are highly sought after by the Ecologists and can be sold for much more than most other mutant parts.
text.ru: Мозг контролёра высоко развит и наделён способностью овладевать умами других существ. Именно поэтому он так ценится учеными и может быть продан гораздо дороже, чем любой другой трофей.
