text.en: A controller's hands are believed to assist its brain with some of its mental abilities, such as directing psychic bolt attacks. As such, they are just as highly sought after by the Ecologists, who value them equally as important as the controller's brain.
text.ru: Считается, что руки контролера, наряду с его мозгом, наделяют это существо такими способностями, как, например, направленные ментальные атаки. Ценятся учёными не меньше, чем мозг контролера.

text.en: Commonly harvested and traded in the Zone. Preferred over flesh meat because of its less bitter taste. Trades for a low but acceptable price.
text.ru: Обычно добывается и продаётся в Зоне. Ценится лучше, чем мясо плоти, из-за менее горького вкуса.

text.en: A long, hairless tail formerly attached to the rear end of a dog. With no real practical use, they are the cheapest of all mutant body parts found in the Zone.
text.ru: Длинный, бесшёрстный хвост слепого пса. Не имеет абсолютно никакой пользы и является самым дешёвым трофеем в Зоне.

text.en: Completely different from those of the farm pigs they descended from, the eyeball of a flesh is heavy, large and entirely brown in colour.
text.ru: Абсолютно отличающийся от глаз обычных свиней, от которых эти существа произошли, глаз Плоти представляет из себя большой тяжелый шар полностью коричневого цвета.

text.en: Tough and bitter flesh meat is a frequently ate meal in the Zone. Inexpensive, but most stalkers would prefer overpriced canned goods given the choice.
text.ru: Жёсткое и горькое мясо плоти является наиболее распространенной едой в Зоне. Однако, большинство сталкеров всё же предпочитают обычные консервы.

text.en: A hand which once belonged to a fracture. Whilst thin and very boney, it also has extraordinary long and pointy fingers.
text.ru: Рука излома. Несмотря на свою тонкость и костлявость, она часто имеет необычайно длинные и острые пальцы.

text.en: Tentacles from a bloodsucker produce a ferment that can dissolve through even the toughest mutant hides whilst simultaneously preventing blood from clotting. Many researchers, including the Ecologists, believe that they hold many secrets to great medical advances.
text.ru: Щупальца Кровососа содержат особую железу: она выделяет фермент, растворяющий кожу жертвы, и одновременно препятствующий сворачиванию крови. Если учёным удастся определить структуру фермента, то это поможет осуществить прорыв в медицине.

text.en: A stringy portion of bloodsucker meat. Despite the risks involved to kill one, it is often sold cheap because of its putrid taste.
text.ru: Кусок волокнистого мяса кровососа. Несмотря на то, что достать его не так просто, зачастую продается за копейки из-за отвратительного вкуса.

text.en: A large, grotesque eyeball formerly belonging to a pseudogiant. It is interesting to note that a pseudogiant's eyeballs are usually two different sizes. While not particularly interesting, they can usually sell for a good price.
text.ru: Огромный, по сравнению с человеческим, глаз псевдогиганта. Что интересно, у этих существ глаза обычно разных размеров. Не представляет никакой пользы, но тем не менее может быть продан за неплохие деньги.

text.en: A large, muscled hand from a pseudogiant which are ironically one of the smallest body parts of the creature. Not very useful but hard to obtain, so they can still get a good price if sold to the right buyer.
text.ru: Огромная, мускулистая рука псевдогиганта, которая, тем не менее, является одной из наименьших частей тела этого существа. Пользы не представляет, однако весьма ценится коллекционерами за свою редкость.

text.en: Harder to obtain than dog meat, but tastes almost exactly the same. Most stalkers won't pay a substantial amount because of this.
text.ru: Несмотря на то, что достать данное мясо сложнее, чем мясо слепой собаки, на вкус они практически одинаковы. Поэтому большинство сталкеров не будут платить за него больше.

text.en: The fur covering the tail of a pseudodog is a great insulator and is often sewn into clothing and armoured suits when nearing the colder parts of the year.
text.ru: Мех на хвосте псевдособаки является отличным термоизолятором, поэтому сталкеры часто вшивают их под комбинезоны и бронежилеты в холодные времена года.

text.en: The severed hand of a snork. Not drastically different from that of a person, but entirely grey, and covered in blisters and open wounds.
text.ru: Рука снорка. От человеческой ничем кардинально не отличается, кроме того, что имеет серый оттенок и покрыта множеством ран и волдырей.

text.en: Highly elasticated tendons found in the feet and legs of snorks give them the ability to make extraordinarily long leaps, much further than regular human beings.
text.ru: Стопа снорка, в отличие от человеческой, содержит большее количество сухожилий, обладающих потрясающей эластичностью. Этим объясняется способность снорков совершать невероятные прыжки.

text.en: The eyes, ears, mouth and nose of a tushkano in a small, tiny package. Not very useful, nor very valuable.
text.ru: Глаза, уши, пасть и нос тушкана в крошечной упаковке. Не очень полезные, не очень ценные.

text.en: Whilst it comes in small portions there is also quite a large supply. Stalkers will only be willing to part with a small amount of rubles because of this.
text.ru: Несмотря на то, что мяса с этих грызунов много не соберёшь, это наиболее дешёвая и часто встречающаяся пища, что обуславливается огромным количеством тушканов в Зоне.

text.en: A dirty and disgusting hand from a zombie. After losing all but their basic instincts, zombified stalkers resort to using their hands as weapons.
text.ru: Грязная и мерзкая рука зомби. Потеряв всё, кроме первобытных инстинктов, зомбированные используют их в качестве оружия.

text.en: The character does not have enough money

The leather jacket does not provide sufficient protection from the Zone's harsh conditions, since it's simply a leather anorak with blue trousers tucked into hiking boots. Typically, it's also worn with a backpack with extra straps across the chest. Leather offers little protection from gunfire or claws and it's absolutely useless against radiation or anomalies.
text.ru: Обычная плотная кожаная куртка, каких много. Кожа дает небольшую защиту от огня или когтей, но против аномалий и радиации совершенно бесполезна.

text.en: Is the explosion of '86 your work too?
No, we had nothing to do with that. Most of us were only starting out in science back then. The Chernobyl Zone was not used as a testing site for experiments until 1989.
text.ru: Нет, мы здесь ни при чем. Наш эксперимент начался уже после аварии на Чернобыльской АЭС.

text.en: The transports we use to send our marked "agents" into the Zone. They infiltrate the stalker “community” and carry out our orders without realising it. Unfortunately, more than half of stalkers die during transportation, the Zone is very unstable. You are one of our agents sent to kill Strelok and we're now trying to work out how we made that mistake.
text.ru: Это транспорт, которым мы доставляем наших агентов в разные части Зоны. Агенты внедряются в среду сталкеров и выполняют задачи, на которые они были запрограммированы, даже не подозревая об этом. К сожалению, более половины агентов при транспортировке погибают, так как Зона очень нестабильна.

text.en: I'm not going to help you in this deception.
text.ru: Нет, я отказываюсь присоединяться к вам.

text.en: Hello, Strelok. I see you have many questions for me. Well, ask them and then we can decide what to do with you.
text.ru: Здравствуй, Стрелок. Я вижу, у тебя ко мне много вопросов. Задавай их, а потом мы решим, что с тобой делать.

text.en: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. is a coded acronym, which we use to mark agents programmed for particular missions. Your mission, as our agent, was to kill Strelok and his group. They got too close to finding out things they shouldn't know. We created a network of psi-fields on the way to the Zone's center in order to recruit agents. You know one of these fields by the name of Brain Scorcher. When a stalker attempts to reach the Zone's center in order to fulfil some wish we acquire control over his consciousness and program him to a specific mission. A mistake was made and your mission was to kill yourself.
text.ru: С.Т.А.Л.К.Е.Р. - это название программы по кодированию человека на выполнение определенных задач. На подходах к центру Зоны мы расположили несколько пси-установок. Самая крупная из них известна вам как «Выжигатель мозгов». Все, кто пытается пройти к центру Зоны, попадают под наш контроль. Затем они проходят кодирование, становятся нашими агентами и получают татуировку С.Т.А.Л.К.Е.Р. Рассылая их по Зоне, мы влияем на ход событий и обеспечиваем свою безопасность.

text.en: You're a bolt that fell out of the machine. Unfortunately, that did not come to our attention for a long time. From the moment the Zone was formed, many people have tried to get to its center but we cannot let that happen. Humanity is not ready for the truth. That is why we recruited stalkers by promising them the fulfilment of their most coveted desires. Once recruited they would be sent to protect the Zone's secret.
text.ru: Ты - выпавший из механизма винтик. Во время одного из походов к центру Зоны, ты слишком близко подобрался к нам. Наша защита от проникновения считалась совершенной, но тебе удалось найти путь, о существовании которого мы не подозревали. Допустить, чтобы нашу тайну узнал кто-либо еще, мы не могли: человечество пока не готово узнать правду о причинах появления Зоны. Поэтому мы немедленно стали кодировать наших агентов на твое уничтожение. По невыясненной причине оборудование дало сбой, и мы не заметили, что ты сам оказался в числе сталкеров, которые попали под наш контроль. В результате ты получил задание убить самого себя.

text.en: What is the Zone? How did it come about?
text.ru: Что такое Зона? Почему она возникла?

text.en: What you see is the result of ill-considered intervention in the Earth's noosphere. Attempts to affect the noosphere brought about a local crack. The Zone is simply the visible manifestation of this crack. The underlying problem is far greater than you can imagine.
text.ru: Зона - это результат вышедшего из-под контроля эксперимента с ноосферой - информационным полем Земли. Мы собирались подключиться к ноосфере, чтобы исследовать возможность влиять на нее. Однако, во время эксперимента произошел пробой, и энергия ноосферы хлынула на землю, меняя все вокруг. Так образовалась аномалия, которую вы называете Зоной.

text.en: That depends on you. The Zone is growing. We're trying to restrain its expansion but humanity seems to be intent on hindering our work. Our resources are not limitless and bodies connected to C-Consciousness eventually die. If you join us, we can restrict the Zone's growth. If you decide otherwise we cannot make a credible prognosis of the outcome.
text.ru: Что будет дальше - зависит от тебя. Зона медленно, но неуклонно растет. Наших сил едва хватает на то, чтобы сдерживать поток энергии ноосферы. Ты можешь присоединиться к нам - наши силы возрастут и, возможно, мы сумеем взять его под контроль. Ты можешь уничтожить нас. Тогда энергия ноосферы беспрепятственно потечет в Зону, и к чему это приведет - неизвестно.

text.en: We are the result of an experiment aimed at creating a super-consciousness called "C-Consciousness". The consciousnesses of seven volunteers were connected during the experiment leading to the creation of the super-consciousness that is us. We immediately subordinated those who were conducting the experiment and assigned them to tasks we needed them to carry out. According to our calculations, Earth is surrounded by a special informational field, the so-called noosphere. It includes all the inhabitants of the planet with cognitive abilities. Our main goal was to make small adjustments to the noosphere, allowing us to remove things like anger, cruelty, greed and other negative factors from the planet. Individuals are unable to affect the noosphere but C-Consciousness could. Unfortunately we made a mistake and our interference spawned the Zone, which we have been trying to contain ever since.
text.ru: Мы - «О-Сознание», группа исследователей, которые поставили перед собой цель изменить мир. Известно, что Землю окружает особое информационное поле - ноосфера. Она тесно связана со всеми разумными существами на планете и хранит все их мысленные образы. Мы решили подключиться к ноосфере и внести в нее изменения: убрав все темное, что породило человечество, сделать мир идеальным. Ни один человеческий разум не обладает достаточной мощью, чтобы взаимодействовать с ноосферой, поэтому мы объединили наши сознания.

text.en: It was the best place. After the explosion in 1986 there were very few people left in this area and we could work without fear of being found. Further, there were many powerful antennae here, which are extremely important for our cognitive optimisation experiments.
text.ru: Чернобыльская АЭС была наиболее подходящим местом для наших экспериментов. Во-первых, после аварии 1986 года здесь осталось очень мало людей, поэтому мы могли работать без опаски. Во-вторых, станция обеспечивала нас энергией, необходимой для работы установок. В-третьих, рядом со станцией находились мощные антенны, которые использовались в экспериментах по воздействию на сознание людей.

text.en: I agree to join the C-Consciousness project.
It's blocked, and there's no button. I get the feeling someone's going to have to make for the control room to solve this one.
text.ru: It's blocked, and there's no button. I get the feeling someone's going to have to make for the control room to solve this one.

text.en: I'll wait down here and cover our backs, okay?
text.ru: I'll wait down here and cover our backs, okay?

text.en: Damn, I knew we shouldn't have come here.
text.ru: Damn, I knew we shouldn't have come here.

text.en: No point standing around here, that's for sure.
text.ru: No point standing around here, that's for sure.

text.en: My gut feeling is that we've made it.
text.ru: My gut feeling is that we've made it.

text.en: So... How about pressing the button?
text.ru: So... How about pressing the button?

text.en: Great! The gate has no power.
text.ru: Great! The gate has no power.

text.en: Man, they don't let up, do they.
text.ru: Man, they don't let up, do they.

text.en: Mmmh... something feels wrong here too.
text.ru: Mmmh... something feels wrong here too.

text.en: Hey, you'll be careful with that thing, all right?
text.ru: Hey, you'll be careful with that thing, all right?

text.en: I'm getting a strange feeling, and not the good kind.
text.ru: I'm getting a strange feeling, and not the good kind.

text.en: Hey! So, are we moving or what?
text.ru: Hey! So, are we moving or what?

text.en: Why did I even get into this?
text.ru: Why did I even get into this?

text.en: The hell with this place! I can't wait till I'm outta here.
text.ru: The hell with this place! I can't wait till I'm outta here.

text.en: I can't believe this shit they told me, 'Don't worry, piloting is easy as pie.' My ass!
text.ru: I can't believe this shit they told me, 'Don't worry, piloting is easy as pie.' My ass!

text.en: Quiet! Keep it nice and quiet!
text.ru: Quiet! Keep it nice and quiet!

text.en: We'll talk once we get out of here.
text.ru: We'll talk once we get out of here.

text.en: This is hardly the time to talk.
text.ru: This is hardly the time to talk.

text.en: Ooh... stop it! You're hurting me!
text.ru: Ooh... stop it! You're hurting me!

text.en: Let's see if there's a way of getting through this.
text.ru: Let's see if there's a way of getting through this.

text.en: Come! I've found a way through.
text.ru: Come! I've found a way through.

text.en: Hm... go this way once, it may be your last.
text.ru: Hm... go this way once, it may be your last.

text.en: Okay, there's a way through here. Let's hope it leads somewhere a little less deadly.
text.ru: Okay, there's a way through here. Let's hope it leads somewhere a little less deadly.

text.en: So... the gate is blocked, huh? Hmm... I don't know... Maybe it can be opened from the control room?
text.ru: So... the gate is blocked, huh? Hmm... I don't know... Maybe it can be opened from the control room?

text.en: Keep moving, buddy! I've got your rear covered. Don't you worry.
text.ru: Keep moving, buddy! I've got your rear covered. Don't you worry.

text.en: Door's open over there. Shall we go that way?
text.ru: Door's open over there. Shall we go that way?

text.en: Look it! Press the button or something, yeah?
text.ru: Look it! Press the button or something, yeah?

text.en: There's been a power cut, huh-huh...
text.ru: There's been a power cut, huh-huh...

text.en: Hey! Don't go there! It's closed off.
text.ru: Hey! Don't go there! It's closed off.

text.en: Muzzle flash on the right... er... I mean, left.
text.ru: Muzzle flash on the right... er... I mean, left.

text.en: Listen, there should be levers on this thing that you can turn stuff on with.
text.ru: Listen, there should be levers on this thing that you can turn stuff on with.

text.en: Hey, man! Quit wasting time. Do it long enough and we'll get wasted ourselves.
text.ru: Hey, man! Quit wasting time. Do it long enough and we'll get wasted ourselves.

text.en: You know, it's not so bad here... I think.
text.ru: You know, it's not so bad here... I think.

text.en: With loyal friends by your side even this shit ain't that bad.
text.ru: With loyal friends by your side even this shit ain't that bad.

text.en: It's a good thing I decided to follow you. How else could I've seen a place like this?
text.ru: It's a good thing I decided to follow you. How else could I've seen a place like this?

text.en: Listen, this isn't the best time to chat.
text.ru: Listen, this isn't the best time to chat.

text.en: I'll be honest with you. This is neither the time nor the place to talk.
text.ru: I'll be honest with you. This is neither the time nor the place to talk.

text.en: Our Monolith comrade has been killed.
text.ru: Our Monolith comrade has been killed.

text.en: Hey, man! Where are you going? Let's work together on this one!
text.ru: Hey, man! Where are you going? Let's work together on this one!

text.en: The gate is blocked. If I were you, I'd have a look around the control room.
text.ru: The gate is blocked. If I were you, I'd have a look around the control room.

text.en: I'll stay here and cover the approaches.
text.ru: I'll stay here and cover the approaches.

text.en: The door is open. Shall we go?
text.ru: The door is open. Shall we go?

text.en: We're out in the open here. Let's move!
text.ru: We're out in the open here. Let's move!

text.en: Looks like there's no power being supplied to the gate.
text.ru: Looks like there's no power being supplied to the gate.

text.en: A transformer. I remember these from my childhood.
text.ru: A transformer. I remember these from my childhood.

text.en: This isn't the best place to twiddle your thumbs, let's go!
text.ru: This isn't the best place to twiddle your thumbs, let's go!

text.en: I think I may have been here at some point. I'm not sure.
text.ru: I think I may have been here at some point. I'm not sure.

text.en: Strange... Everything about this place is strange.
text.ru: Strange... Everything about this place is strange.

text.en: I... I don't feel like talking.
text.ru: I... I don't feel like talking.

text.en: I suggest you stop that right now!
text.ru: I suggest you stop that right now!

text.en: Don't rush ahead! It's best to stick together around here.
text.ru: Don't rush ahead! It's best to stick together around here.

text.en: The gate is blocked, and there's no button here. Anyone feel like going to the control room and seeing if there's anything there to help us?
text.ru: The gate is blocked, and there's no button here. Anyone feel like going to the control room and seeing if there's anything there to help us?

text.en: Keep moving, bro! I've got your back.
text.ru: Keep moving, bro! I've got your back.

text.en: Well, the way is clear. Let's go!
text.ru: Well, the way is clear. Let's go!

text.en: Hm... looks like the direct route is not an option.
text.ru: Hm... looks like the direct route is not an option.

text.en: No worries. Real men often take the backdoor.
text.ru: No worries. Real men often take the backdoor.

text.en: Well, at least the protective suits will get some use.
text.ru: Well, at least the protective suits will get some use.

text.en: Hm... the power to the gate has been cut.
text.ru: Hm... the power to the gate has been cut.

text.en: Well, bro... let's rock and roll!
text.ru: Well, bro... let's rock and roll!

text.en: Mess with the best, die like the rest.
text.ru: Mess with the best, die like the rest.

text.en: This looks like a transformer. I wonder if all the lines have been activated.
text.ru: This looks like a transformer. I wonder if all the lines have been activated.

text.en: Keep up, bro! We've got to keep moving forward.
text.ru: Keep up, bro! We've got to keep moving forward.

text.en: What a mess! You'd get an asskicking for this kind of thing at our base.
text.ru: What a mess! You'd get an asskicking for this kind of thing at our base.

text.en: This place is no Sandy Beach, that's for sure.
text.ru: This place is no Sandy Beach, that's for sure.

text.en: Let's talk once this is over.
text.ru: Let's talk once this is over.

text.en: Ugh! What the hell are you doing?!
text.ru: Ugh! What the hell are you doing?!

text.en: Urgh! Hey, I don't stand for that kind of shit!
text.ru: Urgh! Hey, I don't stand for that kind of shit!

text.en: Come back, bro! We don't need a scout on this mission.
text.ru: Come back, bro! We don't need a scout on this mission.

text.en: Show the map and task list
text.ru: Показать карту Зоны и список заданий

text.en: I'm Major Degtyarev, USS. I'm here to investigate the failure of operation "Fairway".
text.ru: I'm Major Degtyarev, USS. I'm here to investigate the failure of operation "Fairway".

text.en: Stalkers helped me to get to Pripyat.
text.ru: Stalkers helped me to get to Pripyat.

text.en: I have information for Kovalsky. Take me to him.
text.ru: I have information for Kovalsky. Take me to him.

text.en: Put your weapons on the ground, now!
text.ru: Put your weapons on the ground, now!

text.en: You're a merry gang, ain't you?
text.ru: You're a merry gang, ain't you?

text.en: Who are you? What's your business with the commander?
text.ru: Who are you? What's your business with the commander?

text.en: Don't shoot! I'm Lieutenant Sokolov, co-pilot of Stingray-4. I'm on my way to B28 emergency position.
text.ru: Don't shoot! I'm Lieutenant Sokolov, co-pilot of Stingray-4. I'm on my way to B28 emergency position.

text.en: What do you think we're here for, fun? Why so trigger-happy? Can't you see that we're all friends here? Me and agent D-De... have been through a lot. Trust me on that.
text.ru: What do you think we're here for, fun? Why so trigger-happy? Can't you see that we're all friends here? Me and agent D-De... have been through a lot. Trust me on that.

text.en: And I don't give a rat's ass who's working for who.
text.ru: And I don't give a rat's ass who's working for who.

text.en: I have no business with the army...
text.ru: I have no business with the army...

text.en: Major, speak to the Colonel if you need something.
text.ru: Major, speak to the Colonel if you need something.

text.en: You must be looking for the Colonel, Major.
text.ru: You must be looking for the Colonel, Major.

text.en: Colonel Kovalsky is the person to speak to, sir.
text.ru: Colonel Kovalsky is the person to speak to, sir.

text.en: Kovalsky is the man to speak to, sir.
text.ru: Kovalsky is the man to speak to, sir.

text.en: Sir, you should see Kovalsky if you need something.
text.ru: Sir, you should see Kovalsky if you need something.

text.en: Attention all units! This is Colonel Kovalsky. The base is under attack. The entrance has been blocked until the threat is eliminated.
text.ru: Attention all units! This is Colonel Kovalsky. The base is under attack. The entrance has been blocked until the threat is eliminated.

text.en: Major, if you don't mind, could you holster that weapon?
text.ru: Major, if you don't mind, could you holster that weapon?

text.en: Listen, Major, holster your weapon, would you? We won't shoot you, you have my word.
text.ru: Listen, Major, holster your weapon, would you? We won't shoot you, you have my word.

text.en: Come on, Major. Put your gun away for God's sake. Everyone's jumpy enough as it is.
text.ru: Come on, Major. Put your gun away for God's sake. Everyone's jumpy enough as it is.

text.en: Attention all units! This is Colonel Kovalsky. The threat has been eliminated.
text.ru: Attention all units! This is Colonel Kovalsky. The threat has been eliminated.

text.en: Attention all units! This is Colonel Kovalsky. The emission is over.
text.ru: Attention all units! This is Colonel Kovalsky. The emission is over.

text.en: Attention all units! This is Colonel Kovalsky. According to our readings an emission is approaching. Take cover immediately!
text.ru: Attention all units! This is Colonel Kovalsky. According to our readings an emission is approaching. Take cover immediately!

text.en: Attention all units! This is Colonel Kovalsky. An emission is starting, I repeat, an emission is starting. Take cover immediately!
text.ru: Attention all units! This is Colonel Kovalsky. An emission is starting, I repeat, an emission is starting. Take cover immediately!

text.en: We thank you, Monolith, for revealing the cunning plans of Your enemies to us. May Your light shine down on the souls of the brave soldiers who gave their lives in service to Your will. Onward, warriors of the Monolith! Avenge your fallen brothers, blessed as they are in their eternal union with the Monolith. Bring death to those who spurn the holy power of the Monolith!
text.ru: We thank you, Monolith, for revealing the cunning plans of Your enemies to us. May Your light shine down on the souls of the brave soldiers who gave their lives in service to Your will. Onward, warriors of the Monolith! Avenge your fallen brothers, blessed as they are in their eternal union with the Monolith. Bring death to those who spurn the holy power of the Monolith!

text.en: They'll spot you like that, Major.
text.ru: They'll spot you like that, Major.

text.en: Let's wait until they get to the center of the yard.
text.ru: Let's wait until they get to the center of the yard.

text.en: We must act before we're spotted. Open fire!
text.ru: We must act before we're spotted. Open fire!

text.en: Ice, get to the roof. The rest of you, follow me.
text.ru: Ice, get to the roof. The rest of you, follow me.

text.en: Ready to attack on your order.
text.ru: Ready to attack on your order.

text.en: Strange. Is someone leaking our plans to them? We should take this to Kovalsky.
text.ru: Strange. Is someone leaking our plans to them? We should take this to Kovalsky.

text.en: Let's check them out. Ice, cover us!
text.ru: Let's check them out. Ice, cover us!

text.en: Kovalsky, something strange is going on here. There were loads of Monolith fighters inside the building. They were all in a trance, and talking to... A pile of trash. I examined this pile, and if you cut through the crap, it resembles a primitive antenna. It seems that someone talks to them through this antenna... And they believe it to be divine intervention.
text.ru: Kovalsky, something strange is going on here. There were loads of Monolith fighters inside the building. They were all in a trance, and talking to... A pile of trash. I examined this pile, and if you cut through the crap, it resembles a primitive antenna. It seems that someone talks to them through this antenna... And they believe it to be divine intervention.

text.en: This is all very strange. Someone's controlling these fanatics... Hmm. We'll get back to this later.
text.ru: This is all very strange. Someone's controlling these fanatics... Hmm. We'll get back to this later.

text.en: This is all very strange. Someone's controlling these fanatics... Hmm. We'll get back to this later. The sentry hasn't showed up yet, so let me know if you find him. Over and out.
text.ru: This is all very strange. Someone's controlling these fanatics... Hmm. We'll get back to this later. The sentry hasn't showed up yet, so let me know if you find him. Over and out.

text.en: Monolith, we do not hear you.
text.ru: Monolith, we do not hear you.

text.en: Why have you left us, Monolith?
text.ru: Why have you left us, Monolith?

text.en: Holy shit, this place is teeming with them!
text.ru: Holy shit, this place is teeming with them!

text.en: You know, I thought I'd be safer with you.
text.ru: You know, I thought I'd be safer with you.

text.en: Take them out before they snap out of it!
text.ru: Take them out before they snap out of it!

text.en: I signed up as soon as I found out you need help. I'll follow you to the bitter end, man.
text.ru: I signed up as soon as I found out you need help. I'll follow you to the bitter end, man.

text.en: The recon unit had information about the location of Monolith forces. The notes indicate the bookstore.
text.ru: The recon unit had information about the location of Monolith forces. The notes indicate the bookstore.

text.en: The recon unit only spotted Monolith patrols. They didn't see any large squads or units.
text.ru: The recon unit only spotted Monolith patrols. They didn't see any large squads or units.

text.en: I found the unit. They're all dead. Looks like they were shot, but there's no trace of the enemy.
text.ru: I found the unit. They're all dead. Looks like they were shot, but there's no trace of the enemy.

text.en: I don't understand how they could've attacked so suddenly, without leaving any evidence. Really strange. ... Major, we just picked up the sentry's signal! The coordinates place him somewhere near the grocery store. Check it out if you can. I'm counting on you, Major. Over and out.
text.ru: I don't understand how they could've attacked so suddenly, without leaving any evidence. Really strange. ... Major, we just picked up the sentry's signal! The coordinates place him somewhere near the grocery store. Check it out if you can. I'm counting on you, Major. Over and out.

text.en: We need to find the recon unit. Major, find out what happened! What the hell... Hmm. You be careful out there, okay? And, Major... Keep me posted!
text.ru: We need to find the recon unit. Major, find out what happened! What the hell... Hmm. You be careful out there, okay? And, Major... Keep me posted!

text.en: It's those damned fanatics. We need to deal with them.
text.ru: It's those damned fanatics. We need to deal with them.

text.en: It's those damned fanatics, they don't let up. We're also missing a sentry; he's not answering, and there's not a trace of him either. We've got to take care of those bastards, once and for all.
text.ru: It's those damned fanatics, they don't let up. We're also missing a sentry; he's not answering, and there's not a trace of him either. We've got to take care of those bastards, once and for all.

text.en: Very well, I'll be sending two boys your way. They'll meet you near the target. Over and out.
text.ru: Very well, I'll be sending two boys your way. They'll meet you near the target. Over and out.

text.en: Very well, I'll be sending two boys your way. They'll meet you near the target. And another thing... We've just picked up the sentry's signal. The coordinates place him somewhere near the grocery store. Check it out if you can. I'm counting on you, Major. Over and out.
text.ru: Very well, I'll be sending two boys your way. They'll meet you near the target. And another thing... We've just picked up the sentry's signal. The coordinates place him somewhere near the grocery store. Check it out if you can. I'm counting on you, Major. Over and out.

text.en: Recon unit, come in! What is going on out there?
text.ru: Recon unit, come in! What is going on out there?

text.en: I don't understand how they could've attacked so suddenly. Without leaving any evidence. Really strange. I need to think things over. We'll speak again soon.
text.ru: I don't understand how they could've attacked so suddenly. Without leaving any evidence. Really strange. I need to think things over. We'll speak again soon.

text.en: I've received a message from the recon unit.
text.ru: I've received a message from the recon unit.

text.en: No! ... What the hell is that? ... Wait! ... We're all dead... Argh... Help! Someone help me! Get that thing away from me! Nooo...
text.ru: No! ... What the hell is that? ... Wait! ... We're all dead... Argh... Help! Someone help me! Get that thing away from me! Nooo...

text.en: Wow, I can't believe we made it to Pripyat unscathed. How did you even manage to find this path?
text.ru: Wow, I can't believe we made it to Pripyat unscathed. How did you even manage to find this path?

text.en: It's not that difficult. All you need is skill and a bit of luck, and we've got both. Or maybe it's the Zone, rewarding us for our patience. God knows, I paid my dues with the scientists.
text.ru: It's not that difficult. All you need is skill and a bit of luck, and we've got both. Or maybe it's the Zone, rewarding us for our patience. God knows, I paid my dues with the scientists.

text.en: Yeah. I've had enough of Hermann myself.
text.ru: Yeah. I've had enough of Hermann myself.

text.en: Base, the sentry is dead. He was acting strange and attacked me. I also identified and eliminated a controller in that area.
text.ru: Base, the sentry is dead. He was acting strange and attacked me. I also identified and eliminated a controller in that area.

text.en: Base, the sentry is dead. He was acting strange and attacked me. I also found a controller in that area, so I had to fall back.
text.ru: Base, the sentry is dead. He was acting strange and attacked me. I also found a controller in that area, so I had to fall back.

text.en: Base, the controller has been elminated.
text.ru: Base, the controller has been elminated.

text.en: Copy that, Major. The controller must have taken over the sentry. Eh. He was a good guy. ... Hm. That must have been what happened to the recon unit. The controller forced them to attack each other. Anyway, over and out.
text.ru: Copy that, Major. The controller must have taken over the sentry. Eh. He was a good guy. ... Hm. That must have been what happened to the recon unit. The controller forced them to attack each other. Anyway, over and out.

text.en: Copy that, Major. The controller must have taken over the sentry. You need to kill that asshole, right now! We're at great risk as long as it's still alive.
text.ru: Copy that, Major. The controller must have taken over the sentry. You need to kill that asshole, right now! We're at great risk as long as it's still alive.

text.en: Major, Kovalsky here. We've got another emergency on our hands. Get over here and I'll fill you in on the details.
text.ru: Major, Kovalsky here. We've got another emergency on our hands. Get over here and I'll fill you in on the details.

text.en: Major, I have a favour to ask. Our sentry isn't responding. You know where the grocery store used to be? That's where his signal is coming from. Investigate it if you can. One other thing. Be careful. Over and out.
text.ru: Major, I have a favour to ask. Our sentry isn't responding. You know where the grocery store used to be? That's where his signal is coming from. Investigate it if you can. One other thing. Be careful. Over and out.

text.en: Base, I found one of your men. It looks like he blew himself up with a grenade. There are no signs of a firefight or any other evidence of him being attacked.
text.ru: Base, I found one of your men. It looks like he blew himself up with a grenade. There are no signs of a firefight or any other evidence of him being attacked.

text.en: Kovalsky here. ... Roger that, Major. Hey, I got good news. We finally acquired the exact coordinates of the source of interference. The signal is coming from the kindergarten building.
text.ru: Kovalsky here. ... Roger that, Major. Hey, I got good news. We finally acquired the exact coordinates of the source of interference. The signal is coming from the kindergarten building.

text.en: Our communications expert believes that the signal is being jammed from somewhere close to us. He's working on getting the coordinates as we speak. I sent some of my men to check out a possible source of interference, but they went missing, and their personal signals aren't registering.
text.ru: Our communications expert believes that the signal is being jammed from somewhere close to us. He's working on getting the coordinates as we speak. I sent some of my men to check out a possible source of interference, but they went missing, and their personal signals aren't registering.

text.en: Major, we got a serious problem. This operation has been getting more ridiculous every minute since the helicopters crashed. The men are dropping like flies, we've got no comms with HQ, and the situation just keeps getting worse. The evacuation choppers didn't show up, again. And at this rate it won't be long before we lose control of the situation completely. We need to establish communications with HQ, right now.
text.ru: Major, we got a serious problem. This operation has been getting more ridiculous every minute since the helicopters crashed. The men are dropping like flies, we've got no comms with HQ, and the situation just keeps getting worse. The evacuation choppers didn't show up, again. And at this rate it won't be long before we lose control of the situation completely. We need to establish communications with HQ, right now.

text.en: Major, one of your objectives is to establish communications with HQ. Given the situation we find ourselves in, this should be your priority from now on. Also, as a personal favour to me, please, find my boys.
text.ru: Major, one of your objectives is to establish communications with HQ. Given the situation we find ourselves in, this should be your priority from now on. Also, as a personal favour to me, please, find my boys.

text.en: Major, I need to talk to you. Privately.
text.ru: Major, I need to talk to you. Privately.

text.en: I'm by the building, but all the entrances are blocked.
text.ru: I'm by the building, but all the entrances are blocked.

text.en: The squad sent to look for the source of interference had explosives. Use them to clear the entrance.
text.ru: The squad sent to look for the source of interference had explosives. Use them to clear the entrance.

text.en: The stalker and the Stingray squad are dead. Prepare for take-off.
text.ru: The stalker and the Stingray squad are dead. Prepare for take-off.

text.en: That's everyone, except for the stalker. He's dead. Prepare for take-off.
text.ru: That's everyone, except for the stalker. He's dead. Prepare for take-off.

text.en: Major Degtyarev here. I read you.
text.ru: Major Degtyarev here. I read you.

text.en: [Major Degtyarev] I've managed to acquire documents about experiments carried out in the Zone. Furthermore, we've been contacted by a stalker who's been in the CNPP. His name is Strelok, and he's offered us his cooperation.
text.ru: [Major Degtyarev] I've managed to acquire documents about experiments carried out in the Zone. Furthermore, we've been contacted by a stalker who's been in the CNPP. His name is Strelok, and he's offered us his cooperation.

text.en: [Major Degtyarev] Yes, I have the data. And Strelok's information confirms it. The helicopters were hit by anomalies after their locations changed during the emissions. The anomaly maps issued to their pilots turned out to be useless.
text.ru: [Major Degtyarev] Yes, I have the data. And Strelok's information confirms it. The helicopters were hit by anomalies after their locations changed during the emissions. The anomaly maps issued to their pilots turned out to be useless.

text.en: [Major Degtyarev] Strelok believes that the helicopters went into anomalies. The location of anomalies changes after every emission; a fact that was missed when making the map for Operation Fairway.
text.ru: [Major Degtyarev] Strelok believes that the helicopters went into anomalies. The location of anomalies changes after every emission; a fact that was missed when making the map for Operation Fairway.

text.en: Get in the chopper! I hope it was worth it...
text.ru: Get in the chopper! I hope it was worth it...

text.en: Let's get to the chopper, and we'll talk in the air, okay?
text.ru: Let's get to the chopper, and we'll talk in the air, okay?

text.en: We'll have plenty of time to talk later. We need to make sure we have enough ammo.
text.ru: We'll have plenty of time to talk later. We need to make sure we have enough ammo.

text.en: Well, this was a decent base. The old girl kept us alive; can't ask for more than that. But now we got to get to the birds and fly home.
text.ru: Well, this was a decent base. The old girl kept us alive; can't ask for more than that. But now we got to get to the birds and fly home.

text.en: Let's talk after. My jaws jam up during emissions.
text.ru: Let's talk after. My jaws jam up during emissions.

text.en: Another emission, I'm getting real tired of them.
text.ru: Another emission, I'm getting real tired of them.

text.en: Argh... I feel like I'm in a trench with tanks rolling over it.
text.ru: Argh... I feel like I'm in a trench with tanks rolling over it.

text.en: Man, I thought acid rain was bad enough around here.
text.ru: Man, I thought acid rain was bad enough around here.

text.en: Forget about it. I trade it for rain any day of the weekend, twice on Sunday.
text.ru: Forget about it. I trade it for rain any day of the weekend, twice on Sunday.

text.en: Damn, that's loud! My ears are still ringing, I feel like I'm deaf.
text.ru: Damn, that's loud! My ears are still ringing, I feel like I'm deaf.

text.en: What? Hehheh... Just messing with you.
text.ru: What? Hehheh... Just messing with you.

text.en: Hehh... Every time there's an emission I get this splitting headache.
text.ru: Hehh... Every time there's an emission I get this splitting headache.

text.en: As long as the emission ain't killing you I say that's pretty good going.
text.ru: As long as the emission ain't killing you I say that's pretty good going.

text.en: There's about a dozen zombies in the building.
text.ru: There's about a dozen zombies in the building.

text.en: Colonel, why did comms go down?
text.ru: Colonel, why did comms go down?

text.en: Okay. All right, listen up, operation Fairway is being taken over by the USS. Is Major Degtyarev there?
text.ru: Okay. All right, listen up, operation Fairway is being taken over by the USS. Is Major Degtyarev there?

text.en: Okay. He's in command from now on. Tell him to stay put. He'll be contacted by a superior shortly.
text.ru: Okay. He's in command from now on. Tell him to stay put. He'll be contacted by a superior shortly.

text.en: Would you look at that! The sons of bitches actually made it... You were right, Strelok.
text.ru: Would you look at that! The sons of bitches actually made it... You were right, Strelok.

text.en: There's no time! Check your weapons and fire at will!
text.ru: There's no time! Check your weapons and fire at will!

text.en: Major, can I have a word?
text.ru: Major, can I have a word?

text.en: It looks like the emission is over. Kirillov, contact HQ.
text.ru: It looks like the emission is over. Kirillov, contact HQ.

text.en: Major, we can't wait any longer.
text.ru: Major, we can't wait any longer.

text.en: Come on, boys! One last push!
text.ru: Come on, boys! One last push!

text.en: Move to the left and cover each other!
text.ru: Move to the left and cover each other!

text.en: You heard the news, fellows. When we go, stick together and keep the stalker alive. Any questions?... Get ready to move!
text.ru: You heard the news, fellows. When we go, stick together and keep the stalker alive. Any questions?... Get ready to move!

text.en: Stay alert and follow orders! We're real close to the evacuation point. Let's move!
text.ru: Stay alert and follow orders! We're real close to the evacuation point. Let's move!

text.en: Shit! It's Monolith fighters! Fire at will and keep moving toward the choppers!
text.ru: Shit! It's Monolith fighters! Fire at will and keep moving toward the choppers!

text.en: Shit! Strelok is down! But we still have to get out of here. Go!
text.ru: Shit! Strelok is down! But we still have to get out of here. Go!

text.en: Because of the emission. It's impossible to establish comms during one.
text.ru: Because of the emission. It's impossible to establish comms during one.

text.en: Major, where are you? We need to get Strelok to the evacuation point!
text.ru: Major, where are you? We need to get Strelok to the evacuation point!

text.en: Major, we're going to have to keep moving.
text.ru: Major, we're going to have to keep moving.

text.en: Major, we can't wait for you much longer.
text.ru: Major, we can't wait for you much longer.

text.en: Roger that! We'll be there soon!
text.ru: Roger that! We'll be there soon!

text.en: Every zombie in Pripyat is going to know we're coming! We've got to move faster! Run!
text.ru: Every zombie in Pripyat is going to know we're coming! We've got to move faster! Run!

text.en: Let's move to the right along the building! Double time!
text.ru: Let's move to the right along the building! Double time!

text.en: Our orders are to take off if we come under attack, so hurry the hell up!
text.ru: Our orders are to take off if we come under attack, so hurry the hell up!

text.en: We can't wait any longer! We're leaving in 60 seconds!
text.ru: We can't wait any longer! We're leaving in 60 seconds!

text.en: Major Degtyarev, we're ready to go!
text.ru: Major Degtyarev, we're ready to go!

text.en: To the choppers! Go, go, go!
text.ru: To the choppers! Go, go, go!

text.en: Major Degtyarev, we're taking heavy fire from an unidentified enemy! We cannot hold out for long!
text.ru: Major Degtyarev, we're taking heavy fire from an unidentified enemy! We cannot hold out for long!

text.en: Those... bastards again. Maybe we should go around the building.
text.ru: Those... bastards again. Maybe we should go around the building.

text.en: For successfully completing his investigation, Degtyarev was rewarded with an early promotion to Colonel. He declined an offer of a cushy office position and instead requested to be sent to the Zone as the Security Service's permanent observer.
text.ru: За успешно проведенное расследование Дегтярёв был поощрён внеочередным званием полковника. Отказавшись от предложенной ему штабной должности, он выразил желание направиться в Зону постоянным наблюдателем от Службы безопасности.

text.en: Mercenary squads continue to be active in the Zone. Their interest in the secret laboratories has grown and attracted the intense attention of the USS. Despite this, attempts to establish the identity of the client behind the mercenaries proved unsuccessful.
text.ru: В Зоне продолжают действовать отряды наемников. Их интерес к секретным лабораториям заметно возрос и успел привлечь пристальное внимание СБУ. Тем не менее, установить личность заказчика, стоящего за наемниками, не удалось.

text.en: The area around Yanov station continues to attract growing numbers of stalkers. The lack of dangerous mutants and abundance of anomalous areas have led to the area being referred to by stalkers as a "treasure trove" with increasing regularity.
text.ru: Местность у станции «Янов» привлекает все больше сталкеров. Отсутствие опасных мутантов и изобилие аномальных образований привели к тому, что в сталкерском сознании эти места стали ассоциироваться с «тем самым» Клондайком артефактов.

text.en: The area around Yanov station gained the reputation of being one of the most dangerous places in the Zone. Fewer and fewer stalkers made it back from raids, many dying at the hands of mutants within view of the camp. One of those missing is Zveroboi, who set out to track down a chimera on what appears to have been his last hunt.
text.ru: Местность у станции «Янов» приобрела репутацию одной из самых опасных в Зоне. Все чаще сталкеры не возвращались из вылазок: мутанты убивали их почти у самых стен лагеря. Одним из пропавших без вести стал Зверобой, ушедший в свою последнюю охоту на химеру.

text.en: Zulu returned to Duty's main base at the Rostok plant. Nobody knows what he discussed with the leader of Duty, General Voronin, but several days later he was spotted at the head of a large squad on its way to the center of the Zone.
text.ru: Зулус вернулся к главной базе «Долга» на заводе «Росток». Никто не знает, о чем он говорил с генералом Ворониным, но спустя несколько дней Зулуса видели во главе крупного отряда - и направлялся тот к центру Зоны.

text.en: Rumours of Zulu's fate reached the leader of Duty, General Voronin. To everyone's great surprise, Voronin decided to posthumously award Zulu with the Silver Shield, Duty's highest decoration.
text.ru: Слухи о судьбе Зулуса дошли до командира «Долга» генерала Воронина. Ко всеобщему изумлению, Воронин представил Зулуса к высшей награде «Долга» - ордену «Серебряный щит»... посмертно.

text.en: Vano headed off to the Freedom-controlled military warehouses, where his cheerful personality and optimism quickly earned him the popularity they merited. Ultimately, he took charge of a small group of researchers involved in investigating anomalous areas.
text.ru: Вано ушел на армейские склады, к «Свободе», где легкостью характера и оптимизмом быстро заслужил всеобщую симпатию. В конце концов он возглавил небольшую группу исследователей, которая занялась изучением аномалий.

text.en: Stalkers at Yanov station still think of the cheerful Vano from time to time, recalling his light-heartedness and natural stalker skills. The consensus is that given his luck, Vano made a big mistake in deciding to look for a road to Pripyat.
text.ru: Сталкеры станции «Янов» порой вспоминают весельчака Вано, его жизнерадостность и мастерство прирожденного сталкера. Все сошлись во мнении, что Вано с его удачей не стоило искать дорогу в Припять.

text.en: A new stalker group appeared in the Zone. They are well-trained but their objectives are not known. Unconfirmed rumours suggest that they used to be Monolith fighters, with the squad led by a man known as Strider.
text.ru: В Зоне появилась новая группа сталкеров. Подготовлены они хорошо, но цели их никому не известны. По неподтвержденным слухам, все эти люди когда-то были бойцами «Монолита»; лидер отряда известен под прозвищем Бродяга.

text.en: Few noticed the disappearance of Strider, the only man concerned with understanding what happened to those who fell under the Monolith's spell, and helping them.
text.ru: Немногие заметили исчезновение Бродяги - единственного человека, который пытался понять, что произошло с «монолитовцами», и помочь им.

text.en: Senior Lieutenant Sokolov continued to fly over the Zone and was shot down by mercenaries over Limansk. Two weeks later he was picked up by a patrol near the Cordon, his survival being a minor miracle. Sokolov left the air force soon after, joining a civil airline instead.
text.ru: Старший лейтенант Соколов продолжил летать над территорией Зоны и был сбит наемниками над Лиманском. Через две недели его, выжившего не иначе как чудом, возле Кордона подобрал патруль. Вскоре Соколов покинул ряды ВВС и перешел в гражданскую авиацию.

text.en: The list of casualties suffered in the course of Operation Fairway was amended with yet another name: "Senior Lieutenant O.N. Sokolov. Died in the line of duty."
text.ru: В списке личного состава, потерянного при проведении операции «Фарватер», появилась ещё одна строчка: «Старший лейтенант Соколов О.Н. Погиб при исполнении воинского долга».

text.en: Owl established good contacts with clients outside the Zone. He trades in information, and if rumours are true, one of his major clients is the USS.
text.ru: Сыч наладил хорошие связи с заказчиками вне Зоны. Его товар - информация. По слухам, значительная часть его сведений уходит в СБУ.

text.en: A group of stalkers was forced to seek shelter on Noah's old barge during an especially powerful emission. The barge was attacked by a horde of snorks soon after, and the stalkers quickly realized that the barge was a small but formidable fortress. Even more astonishing was a litter of pseudodog puppies that Noah himself led into battle against the snorks.
text.ru: Во время особенно мощного выброса группа сталкеров была вынуждена искать укрытие в старой барже Ноя. Вскоре судно атаковали снорки, и ребята поняли, что они оказались в небольшой, но приличной крепости. Особое изумление вызвал выводок щенков псевдособаки, которые вместе с Ноем помогали оборонять баржу от мутантов.

text.en: On discovering his friends' fates, Cardan gave up dreams of a stalker career. Having overcome his alcoholism, he moved to Yanov, where he partnered up with Nitro to set up a full service repair shop. Both technicians gladly devote all their spare time to building a vehicle suitable for the Zone's unforgiving environment.
text.ru: Кардан, узнав о судьбе друзей, больше не помышлял о сталкерской карьере. Преодолев алкогольную зависимость, он перебрался на «Янов», где вместе с Азотом организовал мастерскую по ремонту решительно всего. В свободное от работы время оба техника с увлечением конструируют средство передвижения, максимально подходящее для экстремальных условий Зоны.

text.en: Having overcome his alcoholism, Cardan left the Skadovsk. Stalkers said that he went to look for his missing friends. Several days later he returned, wounded and suffering from radiation poisoning. As soon as his wounds healed, he left the Zone forever.
text.ru: Преодолев алкогольную зависимость, Кардан ушел со «Скадовска». Сталкеры говорили, что он искал своих пропавших товарищей. Через несколько дней, израненный и облученный, Кардан вышел к станции «Янов», но, едва подлечившись, ушел из Зоны - навсегда.

text.en: Strelok passed on the information he obtained at the Chernobyl NPP to the USS commanders. This prompted the Government to create a Scientific Institute for Research of the Chernobyl Anomalous Area. Strelok took up the position of Chief Scientific Consultant to the Institute.
text.ru: Стрелок передал руководству СБУ добытые на станции данные. Эта информация подтолкнула правительство к созданию научно-исследовательского института Чернобыльской аномальной зоны. Место главного научного консультанта в нем занял сам Стрелок.

text.en: Strelok's knowledge was lost with him. The information he found at the Chernobyl NPP, which could have been used to solve the Zone's riddles, never reached the outside world. It seems the Zone knows how to keep its secrets.
text.ru: Знания Стрелка были утрачены вместе с ним. Добытая на ЧАЭС информация, которая могла помочь в разгадке тайн Зоны, на Большую землю так и не попала. Запретные территории надёжно хранят свои тайны.

text.en: The information about psi-devices obtained by Degtyarev put his superiors on alert. All the information on X-designated laboratories was removed from military archives and filed as Top Secret. USS personnel working in the Zone were ordered to prevent the disclosure of information about the work done in these laboratories at any cost.
text.ru: Информация о пси-установках, добытая майором Дегтярёвым, не на шутку встревожила его руководство. Все материалы по «икс-лабораториям» были изъяты из военных архивов и помечены грифом «Особой важности». Сотрудники СБУ в Зоне получили приказ любой ценой воспрепятствовать распространению информации о сути проводившихся работ.

text.en: When Colonel Kovalsky, commander of the Stingray group, returned from the Zone, he reported to his commanders on the reasons for the failure of Operation Fairway. Following a dragged-out investigation and the brass' failed attempts to pin the blame on him, the Colonel was finally given an honourable discharge.
text.ru: Командир группы «Скат» полковник Ковальский после возвращения из Зоны доложил начальству о причинах провала операции «Фарватер». После долгого разбирательства и многих попыток переложить на него всю ответственность полковник с почетом ушел в отставку.

text.en: Colonel Kovalsky, commander of the Stingray group, found his resting place not far from the majority of his squad. Their bodies were taken in by the Zone, with nothing but old faded photographs in a specialized military museum left to remind the country of their sacrifice.
text.ru: Командир группы «Скат» полковник Ковальский остался там же, где и большая часть его отряда. Тела поглотила Зона, и теперь все, что напоминает об этих людях - фотографии в траурных рамках на почётном стенде спецмузея.

text.en: Several experimental samples were made on the basis of technical documents for item 62. Following a series of tests, it was decided not to go ahead with large scale deployment of the weapon due to the high cost of ammunition. Nonetheless, there is evidence that further secret development of the Gauss rifle is ongoing.
text.ru: На основе промышленной документации «Изделия №62» было создано несколько опытных образцов. После испытаний от массового применения данного оружия было решено отказаться: стоимость боеприпасов оказалась слишком высокой. Впрочем, некоторые факты позволяют предположить, что совершенствование гаусс-пушки негласно продолжается.

text.en: Sultan and his gang left the Skadovsk after their attempts to capture the ship failed. The ensuing feeling of relative safety among stalkers led to a massive increase in the number of artefacts sold to Beard, causing his business to boom, while the Skadovsk became almost as popular as the famous 100 Rads bar.
text.ru: После того как все попытки взять «Скадовск» под контроль провалились, Султан и его банда покинули судно. С исчезновением этой опасности слабый ручеек сталкеров и артефактов превратился в бурный поток. Бизнес Бороды стал процветать, а «Скадовск» в популярности почти сравнился с баром «100 рентген».

text.en: Sultan's social order settled firmly into place on the Skadovsk, and the vessel became a bandit base. Unwilling to continue paying protection fees, Beard set off with a group of stalkers to explore the yet uncharted regions of the Zone. Stalker attempts to regain control of the ship quickly ceased after a few unruly characters were made example of by being thrown off the vessel to die in emissions.
text.ru: На «Скадовске» окончательно установился «закон» Султана и судно стало базой для бандитов. Борода, не желая платить дань «пацанам», вместе с группой сталкеров двинулся в неизведанные части Зоны. Попытки сталкеров восстановить пережнее положение вещей быстро сошли на нет: показательные отправки под выброс сделали своё дело.

text.en: Skadovsk remained home to all those lucky enough to reach it. Bandits tried to establish their so-called "order" on the ship, but stalkers kept them at bay. A fragile peace broke out on the vessel.
text.ru: «Скадовск» остался прибежищем для всех, кому повезло до него добраться. Бандиты упорно стремились установить на судне свои порядки, однако сталкеры успешно этому противостояли. День за днём тянулось неустойчивое затишье.

text.en: Unfortunately, it didn't last long. Bloodsuckers from the lair near the Skadovsk made their way to the ship. When bloodsucker attacks began to occur even in broad daylight, a mission was launched to deal with the problem. Unfortunately, the operation failed to clear the tunnels, and soon afterwards a wave of predators swept the ship's residents away into oblivion.
text.ru: Но и это длилось недолго. Кровососы, что обитали в логове неподалеку, проторили к судну дорогу. После того как нападения стали происходить даже днем, люди отправились в рейд. К сожалению, им не удалось зачистить туннели, и вскоре очередная волна хищников затопила «Скадовск».

text.en: Following the destruction of the bloodsucker lair, mutants were unable to significantly affect the state of affairs on the Skadovsk. For a while, the old ship became a center of relative stability in the ever-changing world that is the Zone.
text.ru: После уничтожения логова кровососов твари Зоны уже не могли помешать течению здешней жизни. На какое-то время старое судно стало центром относительной стабильности в изменчивом мире Зоны.

text.en: Freedom managed to earn the trust of stalkers at Yanov station. Duty organised an assault in an attempt to regain lost ground, but Lieutenant Colonel Shulga was killed in the ensuing firefight. The Duty squad quickly fell apart after losing its commander.
text.ru: Группировка «Свобода» смогла заслужить доверие сталкеров на станции «Янов». Пытаясь отвоевать утраченные позиции, «Долг» организовал вооруженное нападение, но в этой стычке был убит подполковник Шульга. Лишившись командира, отряд «Долга» прекратил своё существование.

text.en: New recruits and growing popularity among stalkers allowed Duty to drive Freedom out of Yanov station. Loki and his Freedom squad were killed after a fierce battle.
text.ru: Возросшая численность и популярность среди сталкеров позволили «Долгу» вытеснить «свободовцев» со станции «Янов». После ожесточенного боя отряд «Свободы» во главе с Локи был уничтожен.

text.en: A fragile balance was reached between Freedom and Duty squads at Yanov station. Tired of the pointless struggle, fighters of both factions started leaving their squads and joining the free stalkers.
text.ru: Между отрядами «Свободы» и «Долга» на станции «Янов» установилось шаткое равновесие. Утомленные бессмысленной борьбой, бойцы враждующих группировок стали пополнять ряды вольных сталкеров.

text.en: The scientific research expedition organised by Professors Hermann and Ozersky was a success. The data they collected facilitated the development of several unique devices and drugs. In light of this, funding of research programs in the Zone was vastly increased.
text.ru: Научно-исследовательская экспедиция профессоров Германа и Озёрского увенчалась успехом: собранные данные помогли в разработке нескольких уникальных устройств и лекарственных препаратов. В свете этого финансирование программ исследования Зоны было многократно увеличено.

text.en: The scientific research expedition organised by Professors Hermann and Ozersky did not collect enough data and was withdrawn. On returning to the outside world, the two scientists proceeded to engage in unrelated work.
text.ru: Научно-исследовательская экспедиция профессоров Германа и Озёрского не смогла собрать достаточное количество данных и была свёрнута. После возвращения на Большую землю оба ученых занялись деятельностью, не связанной с Зоной.

text.en: Garry's stories about the army's struggle against the dangers of Pripyat interested many, and various groups soon began exploring the ghost town. Despite the constant Monolith attacks, stalkers managed to dig in at the former army camp, which they used as a base to launch raids deep into the city, making steady progress.
text.ru: Рассказы Гарика о борьбе военных с опасностями Припяти заинтересовали многих и вскоре силами разрозненных групп началось изучение города-призрака. Несмотря на постоянные атаки бойцов «Монолита», сталкеры смогли закрепиться в бывшем лагере военных и теперь совершают оттуда вылазки вглубь города, с каждым разом продвигаясь все дальше.

text.en: Garry's story about the army's fate scared stalkers away from Pripyat. The few who dared to venture into the city ran into inexplicable and terrifying phenomena, which added further dark strokes to an already gloomy picture of the dead city.
text.ru: Рассказ Гарика о судьбе военных отпугнул сталкеров от Припяти. Немногие осмелившиеся посетить ее столкнулись с необъяснимыми и пугающими явлениями, что лишь добавило мрачные штрихи к облику мертвого города.

text.en: The Oasis was no longer the stuff of legends. The identity of those who managed to find a way to this secret anomaly became an increasingly regular topic of conversation among stalkers. The number of adventurers trying to follow suit remained high - something the bandits continue to take advantage of. Rookies are fooled by their offers to lead them to the Oasis, which usually end in muggings at a safe distance from other stalkers.
text.ru: Рассказы об Оазисе перестали быть легендами: все чаще в разговорах сталкеров упоминались те, кто смог найти путь к этой тайной аномалии. Поток искателей не иссякает, чем и продолжают пользоваться бандиты. Новички клюют на предложение показать дорогу к Оазису, но дело обычно заканчивается грабежом где-нибудь в сторонке от сталкерских троп.

text.en: [USS Command] Good. As of this moment you are responsible for completing operation Fairway. Kovalsky and the Stingray squad will assist you; Report.
text.ru: [USS Command] Good. As of this moment you are responsible for completing operation Fairway. Kovalsky and the Stingray squad will assist you; Report.

text.en: [USS Command] Roger. Accept his offer. Do you know what caused our helicopters to crash?
text.ru: [USS Command] Roger. Accept his offer. Do you know what caused our helicopters to crash?

text.en: [USS Command] Good. That means we have until the next emission. You'll be collected together with the stalker from position B28. Stingray squad will be evacuated with you, the birds are already in the air. Over and out.
text.ru: [USS Command] Good. That means we have until the next emission. You'll be collected together with the stalker from position B28. Stingray squad will be evacuated with you, the birds are already in the air. Over and out.

text.en: Get up against the wall! These bastards are coming from all sides!
text.ru: Get up against the wall! These bastards are coming from all sides!

text.en: You thought I'd be easy, huh?!
text.ru: You thought I'd be easy, huh?!

text.en: You're the stalker who disabled the Scorcher?
text.ru: You're the stalker who disabled the Scorcher?

text.en: We must inform the HQ of this as soon as possible.
text.ru: We must inform the HQ of this as soon as possible.

text.en: We've got a problem. Our choppers are crashing for reasons that we've not understood yet.
text.ru: We've got a problem. Our choppers are crashing for reasons that we've not understood yet.

text.en: Ha-ha-ha! Wow, never heard that one before! A fridge, eh?
text.ru: Ha-ha-ha! Wow, never heard that one before! A fridge, eh?

text.en: Also, Garry headed for Yanov station to restock. He asked me to tell you that he won't be back for a few days.
text.ru: Also, Garry headed for Yanov station to restock. He asked me to tell you that he won't be back for a few days.

text.en: Also, Vano asked me to tell you that he and Garry headed for Yanov station. He said they'll bring back souvenirs.
text.ru: Also, Vano asked me to tell you that he and Garry headed for Yanov station. He said they'll bring back souvenirs.

text.en: Thanks for your help! By the way, the Colonel wants you to pay him a visit.
text.ru: Thanks for your help! By the way, the Colonel wants you to pay him a visit.

text.en: Yes, I have the coordinates, but the signal is intermitting and... it's moving!
text.ru: Yes, I have the coordinates, but the signal is intermitting and... it's moving!

text.en: The signal is back! Transmitting coordinates.
text.ru: The signal is back! Transmitting coordinates.

text.en: Is that really you? Well, I'll be...! We were starting to think we'd never see our doc again.
text.ru: Is that really you? Well, I'll be...! We were starting to think we'd never see our doc again.

text.en: It's back! It's right next to you.
text.ru: It's back! It's right next to you.

text.en: It's close. And it's moving toward our base.
text.ru: It's close. And it's moving toward our base.

text.en: Colonel! A radio signal has been detected and its source is not far from the base. The transmission is encrypted, and I haven't been able to crack it yet.
text.ru: Colonel! A radio signal has been detected and its source is not far from the base. The transmission is encrypted, and I haven't been able to crack it yet.

text.en: What fridge? Where did you find it?
text.ru: What fridge? Where did you find it?

text.en: And what state would that be?
text.ru: And what state would that be?

text.en: So? Tell me! Where were you?
text.ru: So? Tell me! Where were you?

text.en: We had a map with a safe air corridor between anomalies... And the helicopters had emission protection systems!
text.ru: We had a map with a safe air corridor between anomalies... And the helicopters had emission protection systems!

text.en: Until we work it out there won't be any helicopter support. The only way to get to the borders of the Zone is on foot.
text.ru: Until we work it out there won't be any helicopter support. The only way to get to the borders of the Zone is on foot.

text.en: Major, Kovalsky here. You'd better get back here. We need to prepare for a possible attack. Bastards won't catch us with our pants down this time!
text.ru: Major, Kovalsky here. You'd better get back here. We need to prepare for a possible attack. Bastards won't catch us with our pants down this time!

text.en: I'll contact my commanders right after the emission.
text.ru: I'll contact my commanders right after the emission.

text.en: I spoke to the HQ commander and reported the situation to him along with all the information that's been collected. There won't be any helicopter support for a while; he suggested that we fortify your position and await further orders. USS observers are currently at the HQ, so you'll be able to talk to your superiors soon enough.
text.ru: I spoke to the HQ commander and reported the situation to him along with all the information that's been collected. There won't be any helicopter support for a while; he suggested that we fortify your position and await further orders. USS observers are currently at the HQ, so you'll be able to talk to your superiors soon enough.

text.en: Lieutenant! Get'em on the line as soon as you can!
text.ru: Lieutenant! Get'em on the line as soon as you can!

text.en: Hm... Not quite sure how to describe it.
text.ru: Hm... Not quite sure how to describe it.

text.en: Where did I find it...? I'd like to see you find anything in my state.
text.ru: Where did I find it...? I'd like to see you find anything in my state.

text.en: You're not going to believe me anyway, but... in a fridge.
text.ru: You're not going to believe me anyway, but... in a fridge.

text.en: Whew... it's a long story... I'll tell you another time.
text.ru: Whew... it's a long story... I'll tell you another time.

text.en: That's odd... You're telling me you haven't noticed that anomalies move around after an emission? Some disappear, and new ones show up in different places, which makes your map of anomalies effectively useless.
text.ru: That's odd... You're telling me you haven't noticed that anomalies move around after an emission? Some disappear, and new ones show up in different places, which makes your map of anomalies effectively useless.

text.en: The reasons are obvious. There are many anomalies in the air, especially in the center of the Zone.
text.ru: The reasons are obvious. There are many anomalies in the air, especially in the center of the Zone.

text.en: Yes... but my plan didn't work. I came here to speak with your commanders. I have information that will allow the Army to take control of the Zone and destroy it.
text.ru: Yes... but my plan didn't work. I came here to speak with your commanders. I have information that will allow the Army to take control of the Zone and destroy it.

text.en: Don't shoot, I'm headed to the main entrance!
text.ru: Don't shoot, I'm headed to the main entrance!

text.en: Emissions don't just follow one another. If you can scan the area and identify all the anomalies the choppers will be able to collect us safely, provided they're dispatched right after an emission.
text.ru: Emissions don't just follow one another. If you can scan the area and identify all the anomalies the choppers will be able to collect us safely, provided they're dispatched right after an emission.

text.en: Both targets eliminated. Well done! Mission accomplished. Fall back!
text.ru: Both targets eliminated. Well done! Mission accomplished. Fall back!

text.en: Look, there's another group! Let's see which one of them is the messenger.
text.ru: Look, there's another group! Let's see which one of them is the messenger.

text.en: Lieutenant Kirillov, Kovalsky here. I need you to escort the Major.
text.ru: Lieutenant Kirillov, Kovalsky here. I need you to escort the Major.

text.en: I'm guessing the one by the main entrance is their leader.
text.ru: I'm guessing the one by the main entrance is their leader.

text.en: They're done! Time to take them down!
text.ru: They're done! Time to take them down!

text.en: The targets are by the main entrance.
text.ru: The targets are by the main entrance.

text.en: Major! The mercenaries are in position.
text.ru: Major! The mercenaries are in position.

text.en: Both targets escaped. Abort mission and fall back!
text.ru: Both targets escaped. Abort mission and fall back!

text.en: The manuscript contains a short report on how Fang and Strelok infiltrated a hidden laboratory and their journey there. It makes mention of large Monolith presence in and around the Chernobyl NPP. More specifically under the concrete sarcophagus, also suggesting it may be their base of operations but with the intent to hide something. Reading further it states that they discovered laboratory hidden further in the north under the generators, however they were unable to gain access at the time of writing as they required the use of a decoder.
text.ru: Рукопись содержит краткий отчет о том, как Клык и Стрелок проникли в скрытую лабораторию и их путь там. Есть упоминание о присутствии некоего Монолита в окрестностях Чернобыльской АЭС. Более конкретно - под бетонным саркофагом. Также есть предположение, что это, возможно, лишь прикрытие чего-то более важного. Дальше говорится, что они обнаружили лабораторию, скрытую дальше на севере под Генераторами, однако, на момент написания, они не смогли получить туда доступ, поскольку требовалось использование декодера.

text.en: I need you to do something for me. I need specific tools to tune our weapons.
text.ru: Мне нужно, чтобы ты помог мне, брат. Мне нужны специальные инструменты для починки нашего оружия.

text.en: Okay, I need a %s. Go, now.
%s are required by Cleric to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
text.ru: Необходимо принести Отцу Диодору %s, чтобы он смог провести больше улучшений.

text.en: I need some more tools; better tools. Can you find what I ask, again?
text.ru: Мне нужны еще инструменты, получше. Выполнишь мою просьбу еще раз?

text.en: I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
text.ru: Хорошо, мне нужен набор инструментов. В нем должны быть лучшие инструменты, необходимые для работы с оружием.

text.en: Good. You've brought them to me.
%s are required by Cleric to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
text.ru: Необходимо принести Отцу Диодору %s. Ему нужны лучшие инструменты, чтобы суметь провести еще больше улучшений.

text.en: I need some more tools; better tools. Can you find what I ask, again?
text.ru: Мне нужны еще инструменты, самые лучшие. Выполнишь мою просьбу еще раз?

text.en: I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
text.ru: Мне нужны самые лучшие инструменты. Найди их, брат. Тогда я смогу сделать так, что твоё оружие будет разить неверных без промаха.

text.en: Good. You've brought them to me.
text.ru: Отлично. Ты принес их. Монолит помог тебе.

text.en: %s are required by Cleric to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
text.ru: Отцу Диодору нужны %s для проведения элитных модернизаций. Найдите их.

text.en: I have an important mission for you. You must journey into the Zone and clear the area so that our forces may move in. Are you ready?
text.ru: У меня есть важная миссия для тебя, брат. Ты должен уничтожить лагерь неверных, чтобы наши братья могли лучше закрепиться в этом месте. Ты готов?

text.en: The task is done? Good. Praise Monolith.
text.ru: Задача выполнена? Хорошо. Монолит ценит хорошую работу.

text.en: You have been tasked to clear an area for the good of the almighty Monolith. Report back to Rabbit after the job is done.
text.ru: Необходимо подавить территориальную угрозу в данной зоне.

text.en: There are many threats to the great works of the Zone. There is one who is once again planning to deactivate the Brain Scorcher. He must be stopped. You must find him and destroy him.
text.ru: Брат, ты слышал, что недавно несколько неверных подобрались к антеннам? Они хотели отключить Выжигатель. Монолит направил нас, и братья вовремя их заметили. Теперь они мертвы. Монолит мудр и всеведущ. Недавно я узнал еще об одном сталкере, который жаждет отключить Выжигетель. Найди и убей этого неверного.

text.en: You have done well. The Collective is pleased.
text.ru: Ты всё хорошо сделал. Братья гордятся тобой.

text.en: A stalker is trying to deactivate the Brain Scorcher. Kill him.
text.ru: Сталкер хочет отключить Выжигатель Мозгов. Убейте его.

text.en: We grow more powerful every day. We need more weaponry to continue to achieve our goals. You must find a new weapon for us so we may continue to grow our arsenal.
text.ru: Мы наращиваем мощь каждый день. Нам нужно больше оружия для достижения наших целей. Ты должен найти новое оружие для нас.

text.en: Find a new %s and bring it to me.
text.ru: %s – это то, чего нам сейчас не хватает. Принеси, когда найдёшь.

text.en: Rabbit has requested a new rifle to add to the Monolith arsenal.
Our provisions run low. You must go out into the Zone and hunt for meat so that your Monolith brothers may feast.
text.ru: Наши запасы иссякают. Ты должен выйти в Зону и поохотиться.

text.en: Hunt for and bring us %s. Remember these creatures are a gift of the Zone. Kill them swiftly and give thanks. Return the meat to me when you have succeeded.
text.ru: Вот, %s - это то, что нам нужно. Помни, что эти существа - подарок Зоны. Убей их стремительно и с благодарением.

text.en: You have succeeded in your task. Well done.
Hunt for and field dress %s. Return the meat to Rabbit so he may prepare it.
text.ru: Добыть на охоте %s. Отдать мясо Проповеднику - он может приготовить его.

text.en: You must procure more supplies for us so we may continue our great works.
text.ru: Ты должен обеспечить больше поставок для нас, чтобы мы могли продолжить наши великие дела.

text.en: Retrieve %s and bring them to me.
You have done well to serve Monolith.
Procure %s and return them to Rabbit.
We must find another artefact to give as an offering. Will you help serve the good of the Monolith?
text.ru: Нам нужен артефакт, чтобы принести в жертву. Готов ли ты послужить Монолиту и найти его?

text.en: Find a %s. Bring it to me when you have succeeded so we may conduct the ceremony.
text.ru: Вот, %s - это то, что нам нужно. Принеси его мне, чтобы мы могли провести церемонию.

text.en: You serve the Monolith well. Join us tonight in the ceremonial offering. There will be chanting.
text.ru: Ты хорошо служишь Монолиту . Присоединяйся к нам сегодня в церемониальном помещении. Там будет пение.
